Original: LOCKE:What a performance!
Dialogue: What a performance!

Original: CELES:Enough already!
Dialogue: Enough already!

Original: LOCKE:But this is the tough one! Part 2 begins now!
Dialogue: But this is the tough one! Part 2 begins now!

Original: LOCKE:... Where's Setzer?
Dialogue: ... Where's Setzer?

Original: CELES:He's coming.
Dialogue: He's coming.

Original: SETZER:W...who're YOU? You're not Maria!
Dialogue: W...who're YOU? You're not Maria!

Original: CELES:Setzer, we need your help. We have to go to Vector. We need this ship to get there.
Dialogue: Setzer, we need your help. We have to go to Vector. We need this ship to get there.

Original: SETZER:Look, if you're not Maria, I don't want you aboard.
Dialogue: Look, if you're not Maria, I don't want you aboard.

Original: CELES:Wait! We were told your ship is the finest vessel in the world.
Dialogue: Wait! We were told your ship is the finest vessel in the world.

Original: LOCKE:And that you were the world's most notorious gambler...
Dialogue: And that you were the world's most notorious gambler...

Original: SETZER:Come here.
Dialogue: Come here.

Original: SETZER:Don't misunderstand me. I'm still not sure if I'm going to help you.
Dialogue: Don't misunderstand me. I'm still not sure if I'm going to help you.

Original: SETZER:Phew... The Empire's made me a rich man.
Dialogue: Phew... The Empire's made me a rich man.

Original: CELES:Stop thinking of yourself. Many towns and villages have been smashed by the Empire.
Dialogue: Stop thinking of yourself. Many towns and villages have been smashed by the Empire.

Original: LOCKE:The Empire's also totally rotten! It's using magic to enslave the world.
Dialogue: The Empire's also totally rotten! It's using magic to enslave the world.

Original: SETZER:The Empire ...evil...?
Dialogue: The Empire ...evil...?

Original: CELES:We all hate the Empire for the same reasons. That's why...
Dialogue: We all hate the Empire for the same reasons. That's why...

Original: SETZER:You know...you're even more stunning than Maria.
Dialogue: You know...you're even more stunning than Maria.

Original: SETZER:Enough! If you... If Celes becomes my wife, I'll help. Otherwise...
Dialogue: Enough! If you... If Celes becomes my wife, I'll help. Otherwise...

Original: LOCKE:WHAT! Are you stupid!?
Dialogue: WHAT! Are you stupid!?

Original: CELES:We haven't any choice.
Dialogue: We haven't any choice.

Original: SETZER:Yes! It's settled!
Dialogue: Yes! It's settled!

Original: CELES:But I have conditions...
Dialogue: But I have conditions...

Original: SETZER:Oho! Fine! I accept!
Dialogue: Oho! Fine! I accept!

Original: LOCKE:Listen to yourself! Celes...you can't become his wife! You just can't!
Dialogue: Listen to yourself! Celes...you can't become his wife! You just can't!

Original: CYAN:That man uses people...
Dialogue: That man uses people...

Original: CELES:I win! Now, honor your part of the bargain!
Dialogue: I win! Now, honor your part of the bargain!

Original: SETZER:How...unusual! A coin with identical sides...!
Dialogue: How...unusual! A coin with identical sides...!

Original: CELES:I think you've been hustled, Mr. Gambler.
Dialogue: I think you've been hustled, Mr. Gambler.

Original: SETZER:Ha! How low can you get?! I love it! All right, I'll help you. Nothing to lose but my life...
Dialogue: Ha! How low can you get?! I love it! All right, I'll help you. Nothing to lose but my life...

Original: LOCKE:This unwieldy-looking ship really moves! Could it crash?
Dialogue: This unwieldy-looking ship really moves! Could it crash?

Original: SETZER:When things fall, they fall! It's all a matter of fate...
Dialogue: When things fall, they fall! It's all a matter of fate...

Original: LOCKE:This ship's going to stick out like a sore thumb. Better land some distance away.
Dialogue: This ship's going to stick out like a sore thumb. Better land some distance away.

Original: SETZER:Right. I'll wait on board in case of an emergency.
Dialogue: Right. I'll wait on board in case of an emergency.

Original: MAN:I...I'm gonna be sick!
Dialogue: I...I'm gonna be sick!

Original: SOLDIER:Get outta here!
Dialogue: Get outta here!

Original: MAN:Urghh... Gonna toss it all...
Dialogue: Urghh... Gonna toss it all...

Original: KEFKA:I'm all-powerful! Hee, hee, haw! I'm collecting Espers! I'm extracting magic! And... ... ... I'll restore the...Statues!
Dialogue: I'm all-powerful! Hee, hee, haw! I'm collecting Espers! I'm extracting magic! And... ... ... I'll restore the...Statues!

Original: KEFKA:You've been completely drained of your powers! Now you're useless to me!
Dialogue: You've been completely drained of your powers! Now you're useless to me!

Original: KEFKA:And you! Take a hike!
Dialogue: And you! Take a hike!

Original: IFRIT:Hmmm...SHIVA:Well, Ramuh DID entrust them with his power.
Dialogue: Hmmm... SHIVA Well, Ramuh DID entrust them with his power.

Original: IFRIT:Gestahl has grabbed our friends and is trying to drain them of their power. I, too, suffered my turn in one of the glass tubes...
Dialogue: Gestahl has grabbed our friends and is trying to drain them of their power. I, too, suffered my turn in one of the glass tubes...

Original: SHIVA:They drained our powers, then threw us away to... We haven't long to live...
Dialogue: They drained our powers, then threw us away to... We haven't long to live...

Original: ESPER:You want to help me... But... I haven't long to live. Just as Ifrit did before me, I'll give to you my power...
Dialogue: You want to help me... But... I haven't long to live. Just as Ifrit did before me, I'll give to you my power...

Original: CID:What are you doing there?
Dialogue: What are you doing there?

Original: CID:W...what's this!?
Dialogue: W...what's this!?

Original: CID:So...Esper magical power can only truly be transferred when one of them passes away...
Dialogue: So...Esper magical power can only truly be transferred when one of them passes away...

Original: CELES:Professor Cid.CID:General Celes! And who might these dubious characters be? Your troops?
Dialogue: Professor Cid. CID General Celes! And who might these dubious characters be? Your troops?

Original: CELES:No... You see, ...
Dialogue: No... You see, ...

Original: CID:Can it be true that you came here as a spy, seeking to cause an uprising?!
Dialogue: Can it be true that you came here as a spy, seeking to cause an uprising?!

Original: LOCKE:!? Celes...?
Dialogue: !? Celes...?

Original: KEFKA:So that's it! Magicite... Cid, you miserable blockhead! Now...
Dialogue: So that's it! Magicite... Cid, you miserable blockhead! Now...

Original: KEFKA:General Celes!! The game's over. Bring me those Magicite shards!
Dialogue: General Celes!! The game's over. Bring me those Magicite shards!

Original: LOCKE:Celes! You...deceived me?!
Dialogue: Celes! You...deceived me?!

Original: CELES:Of course not! Have a little faith!
Dialogue: Of course not! Have a little faith!

Original: KEFKA:G'hee, hee, hee! She has tricked you all! Celes, that's so...YOU!
Dialogue: G'hee, hee, hee! She has tricked you all! Celes, that's so...YOU!

Original: CELES:Locke... Please believe me...
Dialogue: Locke... Please believe me...

Original: KEFKA:Exterminate all of them!
Dialogue: Exterminate all of them!

Original: CELES:Locke... Let me protect you for once... Maybe now... Now you'll believe me...
Dialogue: Locke... Let me protect you for once... Maybe now... Now you'll believe me...

Original: KEFKA:Celes! W...what are you doing? Stop it!!!
Dialogue: Celes! W...what are you doing? Stop it!!!

Original: CID:Ooh, ooh... What happened?
Dialogue: Ooh, ooh... What happened?

Original: CID:This is a disaster! Your fighting has caused the capsules to rupture! Their contents are spilling out!
Dialogue: This is a disaster! Your fighting has caused the capsules to rupture! Their contents are spilling out!

Original: CID:Quick! Over here!
Dialogue: Quick! Over here!

Original: CID:Kefka has used me... used the Empire. What have I done...?
Dialogue: Kefka has used me... used the Empire. What have I done...?

Original: CID:The life-energy of those Espers...
Dialogue: The life-energy of those Espers...

Original: CID:You've helped me come to a decision. I'm going to talk to the Emperor and have this stupid war stopped!
Dialogue: You've helped me come to a decision. I'm going to talk to the Emperor and have this stupid war stopped!

Original: CID:Celes... I've known her since she was a baby. I raised her as if she was my own daughter! But she was forced to become a Magitek Knight, and has done some awful things. If I could only talk to her... I'd apologize for the way her life has turned out.
Dialogue: Celes... I've known her since she was a baby. I raised her as if she was my own daughter! But she was forced to become a Magitek Knight, and has done some awful things. If I could only talk to her... I'd apologize for the way her life has turned out.

Original: CID:No! It's Kefka!
Dialogue: No! It's Kefka!

Original: SETZER:I was starting to worry...
Dialogue: I was starting to worry...

Original: SETZER:? What's up with Celes?
Dialogue: ? What's up with Celes?

Original: SETZER:We'll talk later. Let's get outta here!
Dialogue: We'll talk later. Let's get outta here!

Original: KEFKA:Crud! What a mess!!
Dialogue: Crud! What a mess!!

Original: KEFKA:I don't think so...! You won't get away!
Dialogue: I don't think so...! You won't get away!

Original: LOCKE:Let's not overstay our visit. We're outta here on the double!
Dialogue: Let's not overstay our visit. We're outta here on the double!

Original: SETZER:Right. Speaking of which... Maybe we should be leaving.
Dialogue: Right. Speaking of which... Maybe we should be leaving.

Original: LOCKE:I'm worried about Terra. Let's return to Zozo.
Dialogue: I'm worried about Terra. Let's return to Zozo.

Original: SETZER:Terra? Who's that?
Dialogue: Terra? Who's that?

Original: LOCKE:I'll explain on the way... ...about Terra...Espers...the Returners...
Dialogue: I'll explain on the way... ...about Terra...Espers...the Returners...

Original: TERRA:I remember it all... I was raised in the Esper's world.
Dialogue: I remember it all... I was raised in the Esper's world.

Original: MADUIN:Listen well, and think clearly! What will you do?
Dialogue: Listen well, and think clearly! What will you do?

Original: ELDER:Did I hear there was a human here?
Dialogue: Did I hear there was a human here?

Original: MADUIN:Probably... ...wandered in here by mistake.
Dialogue: Probably... ...wandered in here by mistake.

Original: MADUIN:Did I awaken you?
Dialogue: Did I awaken you?

Original: GIRL:You're...an Esper? What's that pendant for?
Dialogue: You're...an Esper? What's that pendant for?

Original: MADUIN:It's...yours now! It helps protect the Esper World.
Dialogue: It's...yours now! It helps protect the Esper World.

Original: GIRL:Esper World... Boy, did I take the low road or what?
Dialogue: Esper World... Boy, did I take the low road or what?

Original: MADUIN:The Esper folk are pretty upset, you being a human and all...
Dialogue: The Esper folk are pretty upset, you being a human and all...

Original: GIRL:You the one who...saved me?
Dialogue: You the one who...saved me?

Original: ESPER:I am Maduin. I tired living in the human world... That world is filled with desire, greed and loathing. It's highly infectious...
Dialogue: I am Maduin. I tired living in the human world... That world is filled with desire, greed and loathing. It's highly infectious...

Original: MADUIN:Are humans and Espers truly...so different?
Dialogue: Are humans and Espers truly...so different?

Original: MADONNA:So...I'm an example of the evil in this world, huh?
Dialogue: So...I'm an example of the evil in this world, huh?

Original: MADUIN:No, I mean...
Dialogue: No, I mean...

Original: MADONNA:I'll return to my world tomorrow!
Dialogue: I'll return to my world tomorrow!

Original: MADUIN:You'll need a guide.
Dialogue: You'll need a guide.

Original: YOUTH:What's wrong, Maduin?
Dialogue: What's wrong, Maduin?

Original: MADUIN:If you don't want to return to your world, you may stay here.
Dialogue: If you don't want to return to your world, you may stay here.

Original: MADONNA:But humans and Espers can never coexist...!
Dialogue: But humans and Espers can never coexist...!

Original: MADUIN:How do we know for sure unless we observe for ourselves? How do we know... unless we... observe for ourselves...?
Dialogue: How do we know for sure unless we observe for ourselves? How do we know... unless we... observe for ourselves...?

Original: MADUIN:We've given her a name...
Dialogue: We've given her a name...

Original: MADUIN:It's Terra. Not bad, huh?
Dialogue: It's Terra. Not bad, huh?

Original: GESTAHL:Aha! We've finally found it! Those ancient writings told us of this world, and described the awesome magical properties of these beasts!
Dialogue: Aha! We've finally found it! Those ancient writings told us of this world, and described the awesome magical properties of these beasts!

Original: GESTAHL:Grab them! Riches to any man who captures an Esper! GO!
Dialogue: Grab them! Riches to any man who captures an Esper! GO!

Original: ELDER:We've no choice... We must do what we've been avoiding...
Dialogue: We've no choice... We must do what we've been avoiding...

Original: MADUIN:You mean... the magic barrier?
Dialogue: You mean... the magic barrier?

Original: ELDER:Here's the plan. We'll cause a tempest that'll sweep all the nasty creatures out of our realm. Then we'll seal the gate... I am the last of our kind able to cast this magical seal.
Dialogue: Here's the plan. We'll cause a tempest that'll sweep all the nasty creatures out of our realm. Then we'll seal the gate... I am the last of our kind able to cast this magical seal.

Original: MADUIN:But in your state, you might just...
Dialogue: But in your state, you might just...

Original: ELDER:Pass away... but at least we will finally be safe.
Dialogue: Pass away... but at least we will finally be safe.

Original: MADONNA:I, for one, will not miss the other side...
Dialogue: I, for one, will not miss the other side...

Original: ELDER:Let's do it. We have no other choice.
Dialogue: Let's do it. We have no other choice.

Original: ESPER:This is all because of that human girl!
Dialogue: This is all because of that human girl!

Original: ESPER:I'm sure she helped the others find us!
Dialogue: I'm sure she helped the others find us!

Original: MADUIN:Get a grip on yourself!
Dialogue: Get a grip on yourself!

Original: ESPER:No! She's one of them! Soon she'll be wearing our hide!
Dialogue: No! She's one of them! Soon she'll be wearing our hide!

Original: SOLDIER:Look what popped out!
Dialogue: Look what popped out!

Original: GESTAHL:Shriek!!! Just when we were in reach of a veritable bonanza...!
Dialogue: Shriek!!! Just when we were in reach of a veritable bonanza...!

Original: MADONNA:Maduin... I'm not their friend...
Dialogue: Maduin... I'm not their friend...

Original: MADUIN:I understand that!
Dialogue: I understand that!

Original: MADONNA:Thank you...
Dialogue: Thank you...

Original: MADUIN:Can you make it back here?
Dialogue: Can you make it back here?

Original: GESTAHL:A...human girl? Wh... Who is she?
Dialogue: A...human girl? Wh... Who is she?

Original: MADONNA:Please... take care...of my baby...
Dialogue: Please... take care...of my baby...

Original: GESTAHL:YOUR girl!? Eh!? Hmmm...Then she's half human and half... How absolutely fascinating! Mwa, ha, ha... She will help us realize our dream faster than we ever imagined!
Dialogue: YOUR girl!? Eh!? Hmmm...Then she's half human and half... How absolutely fascinating! Mwa, ha, ha... She will help us realize our dream faster than we ever imagined!

Original: GESTAHL:Quiet, my dear!!
Dialogue: Quiet, my dear!!

Original: GESTAHL:We will own this world! Ha, ha, ha...
Dialogue: We will own this world! Ha, ha, ha...

Original: TERRA:That was my father...?
Dialogue: That was my father...?

Original: TERRA:I'm the product of an Esper and a human... That's where I got my powers... Now I understand... I finally feel I can begin to control this power of mine...
Dialogue: I'm the product of an Esper and a human... That's where I got my powers... Now I understand... I finally feel I can begin to control this power of mine...

Original: EDGAR:So Gestahl must've known the secret of the Espers' power back then.
Dialogue: So Gestahl must've known the secret of the Espers' power back then.

Original: LOCKE:And those Espers at the facility were grabbed during that expedition! That means Celes's power came...... at the expense of an Esper...
Dialogue: And those Espers at the facility were grabbed during that expedition! That means Celes's power came...... at the expense of an Esper...

Original: SABIN:They can't get away with this! We have to strike back!
Dialogue: They can't get away with this! We have to strike back!

Original: TERRA:What's happening in Narshe?
Dialogue: What's happening in Narshe?

Original: LOCKE:Hmm... Maybe we should head back that way.
Dialogue: Hmm... Maybe we should head back that way.

Original: SETZER:The airship's ready!
Dialogue: The airship's ready!

Original: TERRA:Come on!
Dialogue: Come on!

Original: SETZER:By all means! Take a turn at the wheel!
Dialogue: By all means! Take a turn at the wheel!

Original: BANON:Oh, you're here! The people of Narshe have finally decided to battle the Empire. How did it go at Vector...?
Dialogue: Oh, you're here! The people of Narshe have finally decided to battle the Empire. How did it go at Vector...?

Original: ARVIS:I see... Your plan would combine Narshe's money with Figaro's machinery to storm the Empire... not enough manpower, though...
Dialogue: I see... Your plan would combine Narshe's money with Figaro's machinery to storm the Empire... not enough manpower, though...

Original: BANON:We have to open the sealed gate...
Dialogue: We have to open the sealed gate...

Original: TERRA:To the Esper World...?
Dialogue: To the Esper World...?

Original: ARVIS:We'll never beat the Empire without them.
Dialogue: We'll never beat the Empire without them.

Original: BANON:When the gate has been opened, the Espers can attack from the east. We'll storm in at the same time, from the north.
Dialogue: When the gate has been opened, the Espers can attack from the east. We'll storm in at the same time, from the north.

Original: BANON:We MUST get the Espers to understand. We have to establish a bond of trust between humans and Espers. Only one person can do this...
Dialogue: We MUST get the Espers to understand. We have to establish a bond of trust between humans and Espers. Only one person can do this...

Original: TERRA:I'll do it. I'm the only one who can!
Dialogue: I'll do it. I'm the only one who can!

Original: TERRA:Let's get this over with.
Dialogue: Let's get this over with.

Original: KEFKA:U'hee, hee, heeee!!!! The Emperor was right! Let Terra fall into your hands, and you'd open the gate for us...!
Dialogue: U'hee, hee, heeee!!!! The Emperor was right! Let Terra fall into your hands, and you'd open the gate for us...!

Original: KEFKA:How does it feel to know you've been working for us?!
Dialogue: How does it feel to know you've been working for us?!

Original: KEFKA:Now I fear you've outlived your usefulness......
Dialogue: Now I fear you've outlived your usefulness......

Original: KEFKA:Oh dear...... you wanna fight me?! This is just dreadful!
Dialogue: Oh dear...... you wanna fight me?! This is just dreadful!

Original: TERRA:Espers... Please heed my call...
Dialogue: Espers... Please heed my call...

Original: KEFKA:It opened!!
Dialogue: It opened!!

Original: KEFKA:I, I, I, I feel so anxious.
Dialogue: I, I, I, I feel so anxious.

Original: KEFKA:Frightful energy!!
Dialogue: Frightful energy!!

Original: TERRA:Look, let's return to the airship.
Dialogue: Look, let's return to the airship.

Original: SETZER:We're almost at Vector.
Dialogue: We're almost at Vector.

Original: LOCKE:What's wrong, Terra?
Dialogue: What's wrong, Terra?

Original: TERRA:I can feel it......It's coming closer and closer...
Dialogue: I can feel it......It's coming closer and closer...

Original: LOCKE:What do you mean you can feel it?
Dialogue: What do you mean you can feel it?

Original: TERRA:It was......glowing!
Dialogue: It was......glowing!

Original: LOCKE:What's that?
Dialogue: What's that?

Original: LOCKE:It can't be......! An Esper???
Dialogue: It can't be......! An Esper???

Original: LOCKE:It's coming!!! Watch out, Terra!!
Dialogue: It's coming!!! Watch out, Terra!!

Original: SETZER:What was that!?
Dialogue: What was that!?

Original: LOCKE:Setzer, get down!
Dialogue: Setzer, get down!

Original: LOCKE:Where are they going?
Dialogue: Where are they going?

Original: TERRA:They were mad......
Dialogue: They were mad......

Original: TERRA:No......Stop...! Please, don't go!!
Dialogue: No......Stop...! Please, don't go!!

Original: LOCKE:They seemed......angry.
Dialogue: They seemed......angry.

Original: SETZER:Forget that...... what's with this vibration?! Is it from the Espers?
Dialogue: Forget that...... what's with this vibration?! Is it from the Espers?

Original: EDGAR:Um......Setzer!!!! I've lost control!!!
Dialogue: Um......Setzer!!!! I've lost control!!!

Original: GESTAHL:I've lost my will to fight...
Dialogue: I've lost my will to fight...

Original: CID:The Emperor's had a change of heart...
Dialogue: The Emperor's had a change of heart...

Original: CID:The Espers came to save their friends. When they learned the others had perished, they went berserk, and trashed the town... Never will I forget their shrieks of rage...
Dialogue: The Espers came to save their friends. When they learned the others had perished, they went berserk, and trashed the town... Never will I forget their shrieks of rage...

Original: SENTRY:We're hanging up our weapons and armor for good.
Dialogue: We're hanging up our weapons and armor for good.

Original: GESTAHL:The power of those Espers... I had no idea...They'll shred the world...! We must get them to understand that we are no longer at war.
Dialogue: The power of those Espers... I had no idea...They'll shred the world...! We must get them to understand that we are no longer at war.

Original: CID:No human's going to make them sit down and listen...
Dialogue: No human's going to make them sit down and listen...

Original: GESTAHL:But for now my friends...Let us feast and rejoice!
Dialogue: But for now my friends...Let us feast and rejoice!

Original: CID:There're some people here who'd prefer to keep fighting. Please, before we dine, talk to as many soldiers as you can! Make them understand!
Dialogue: There're some people here who'd prefer to keep fighting. Please, before we dine, talk to as many soldiers as you can! Make them understand!

Original: TROOPER:Please talk to as many soldiers as you can. You have 4 minutes until dinner.
Dialogue: Please talk to as many soldiers as you can. You have 4 minutes until dinner.

Original: TROOPER:This way, please.
Dialogue: This way, please.

Original: CID:You can count me in as a Returner!
Dialogue: You can count me in as a Returner!

Original: GESTAHL:Imagine! All of us here together, sharing a meal! First we must have a toast!
Dialogue: Imagine! All of us here together, sharing a meal! First we must have a toast!

Original: GESTAHL:As you know, Kefka's in jail for war crimes. What shall we do with him?
Dialogue: As you know, Kefka's in jail for war crimes. What shall we do with him?

Original: GESTAHL:Hmm... Well, let's let him stew in his cell for a while. Then we'll decide what to do.
Dialogue: Hmm... Well, let's let him stew in his cell for a while. Then we'll decide what to do.

Original: GESTAHL:I truly apologize about the poisoning of Doma. No one dreamed Kefka would use poison.
Dialogue: I truly apologize about the poisoning of Doma. No one dreamed Kefka would use poison.

Original: GESTAHL:I'm so terribly sorry! Kefka's being severely punished, and we're cleaning up the poison.
Dialogue: I'm so terribly sorry! Kefka's being severely punished, and we're cleaning up the poison.

Original: GESTAHL:By the way... With regard to General Celes...
Dialogue: By the way... With regard to General Celes...

Original: GESTAHL:Kefka was lying. General Celes realized the war was stupid before anyone else. That's why she joined the returners. Any other questions for me?
Dialogue: Kefka was lying. General Celes realized the war was stupid before anyone else. That's why she joined the returners. Any other questions for me?

Original: GESTAHL:With your permission, I'd like to talk about the Espers...
Dialogue: With your permission, I'd like to talk about the Espers...

Original: GESTAHL:I assure you, I have answered your questions truthfully.
Dialogue: I assure you, I have answered your questions truthfully.

Original: GESTAHL:My Empire's been decimated by the Espers that emerged from the sealed gate. They're acting spiteful. Unless they're stopped, they'll rip the world asunder!
Dialogue: My Empire's been decimated by the Espers that emerged from the sealed gate. They're acting spiteful. Unless they're stopped, they'll rip the world asunder!

Original: GESTAHL:After the Espers went on their rampage, I knew I couldn't go on with my war. I asked myself why I had started it in the first place. By the way... About those questions you asked me... which did you ask first?
Dialogue: After the Espers went on their rampage, I knew I couldn't go on with my war. I asked myself why I had started it in the first place. By the way... About those questions you asked me... which did you ask first?

Original: GESTAHL:Right. Anyway, more than anything I want peace. That's my true dream. I want you to understand that!
Dialogue: Right. Anyway, more than anything I want peace. That's my true dream. I want you to understand that!

Original: CID:You seem a bit tired. Care for a rest break?
Dialogue: You seem a bit tired. Care for a rest break?

Original: GESTAHL:Is there anything you wish to hear me say?
Dialogue: Is there anything you wish to hear me say?

Original: GESTAHL:After they devastated my Empire, the Espers headed northward, toward Crescent Island. They must be found...! We must tell them we're no longer their enemy. After all that I have put them through, it is up to me to set things right. That is why... I need to borrow Terra's power.
Dialogue: After they devastated my Empire, the Espers headed northward, toward Crescent Island. They must be found...! We must tell them we're no longer their enemy. After all that I have put them through, it is up to me to set things right. That is why... I need to borrow Terra's power.

Original: GESTAHL:We must make for Crescent Island aboard the freighter from Albrook.
Dialogue: We must make for Crescent Island aboard the freighter from Albrook.

Original: GESTAHL:I'll have my finest warrior accompany us! General Leo!
Dialogue: I'll have my finest warrior accompany us! General Leo!

Original: LEO:I'm General Leo. Nice to meet you.
Dialogue: I'm General Leo. Nice to meet you.

Original: LEO:I'll be waiting for you in Albrook.
Dialogue: I'll be waiting for you in Albrook.

Original: GESTAHL:We must find the Espers and come to terms with them! You are our last hope!
Dialogue: We must find the Espers and come to terms with them! You are our last hope!

Original: LOCKE:If Terra goes, I'll go.
Dialogue: If Terra goes, I'll go.

Original: TERRA:Locke... Thank you...
Dialogue: Locke... Thank you...

Original: LOCKE:The rest of you wait here. I smell a rat...
Dialogue: The rest of you wait here. I smell a rat...

Original: EDGAR:Agreed... It's hard to trust the Emperor just like that...
Dialogue: Agreed... It's hard to trust the Emperor just like that...

Original: CYAN:We'll stay here and investigate.
Dialogue: We'll stay here and investigate.

Original: LOCKE:Please do. Leave no stone unturned!
Dialogue: Please do. Leave no stone unturned!

Original: EDGAR:Right. And you be careful!
Dialogue: Right. And you be careful!

Original: LEO:There you are. Another of the Empire's generals, and a person I hired in town will be traveling with us.
Dialogue: There you are. Another of the Empire's generals, and a person I hired in town will be traveling with us.

Original: LEO:Let me introduce... General Celes...and Shadow.
Dialogue: Let me introduce... General Celes...and Shadow.

Original: LEO:Is something wrong?
Dialogue: Is something wrong?

Original: LEO:Our departure isn't till tomorrow. I've arranged some lodging for you. Please, get some rest.
Dialogue: Our departure isn't till tomorrow. I've arranged some lodging for you. Please, get some rest.

Original: LOCKE:Come on...! Why won't you speak to me?
Dialogue: Come on...! Why won't you speak to me?

Original: LOCKE:Even if it was only a little...I doubted you... But I'm still your friend...
Dialogue: Even if it was only a little...I doubted you... But I'm still your friend...

Original: LEO:Right...let's go.
Dialogue: Right...let's go.

Original: SOLDIER:All systems A-O-K.
Dialogue: All systems A-O-K.

Original: LEO:We should arrive tomorrow morning. Why not rest until then?
Dialogue: We should arrive tomorrow morning. Why not rest until then?

Original: LEO:You all right?
Dialogue: You all right?

Original: LEO:Looks like you're feeling better...
Dialogue: Looks like you're feeling better...

Original: TERRA:Funny, isn't it... I was used by the Empire... even had my thoughts ripped from me... But here I am cooperating with the "enemy"...
Dialogue: Funny, isn't it... I was used by the Empire... even had my thoughts ripped from me... But here I am cooperating with the "enemy"...

Original: LEO:People are people. Not all of us are like Kefka.
Dialogue: People are people. Not all of us are like Kefka.

Original: TERRA:What...what's with you?
Dialogue: What...what's with you?

Original: LEO:I knew you were being used as a kind of biological weapon...And because I didn't do anything about it, I'm no different than Kefka...
Dialogue: I knew you were being used as a kind of biological weapon...And because I didn't do anything about it, I'm no different than Kefka...

Original: TERRA:I'm the product of a human and an Esper...Will I ever be able to love someone?
Dialogue: I'm the product of a human and an Esper...Will I ever be able to love someone?

Original: LEO:Of course!
Dialogue: Of course!

Original: TERRA:But...I haven't felt that way yet...
Dialogue: But...I haven't felt that way yet...

Original: LEO:You're just young. ...but I understand what you mean. I understand only too well...
Dialogue: You're just young. ...but I understand what you mean. I understand only too well...

Original: TERRA:But...I want to know what love is...now!
Dialogue: But...I want to know what love is...now!

Original: TERRA:Who is it?
Dialogue: Who is it?

Original: SHADOW:Thought I'd sleep out under the stars.
Dialogue: Thought I'd sleep out under the stars.

Original: TERRA:Did you hear... ...what we were just talking about?
Dialogue: Did you hear... ...what we were just talking about?

Original: SHADOW:I didn't mean to overhear anything.
Dialogue: I didn't mean to overhear anything.

Original: SHADOW:I can't help you. You must look within for answers.
Dialogue: I can't help you. You must look within for answers.

Original: SHADOW:In this world are many like me who've killed their emotions. Don't forget that.
Dialogue: In this world are many like me who've killed their emotions. Don't forget that.

Original: LOCKE:Urgh... Uooh... Argh...
Dialogue: Urgh... Uooh... Argh...

Original: LOCKE:Ooh... Ohhhhhhh...
Dialogue: Ooh... Ohhhhhhh...

Original: LOCKE:I think I'm gonna...
Dialogue: I think I'm gonna...

Original: LOCKE:Not a word of this to anyone else, o shrouded one...
Dialogue: Not a word of this to anyone else, o shrouded one...

Original: LOCKE:I think I'm gonna...
Dialogue: I think I'm gonna...

Original: LEO:We're almost at Crescent Island. When we disembark, we'll split into two groups. Celes and I will form one group. Terra, you go with Locke and Shadow. If you spot the Espers, report at once!
Dialogue: We're almost at Crescent Island. When we disembark, we'll split into two groups. Celes and I will form one group. Terra, you go with Locke and Shadow. If you spot the Espers, report at once!

Original: LOCKE:Let's go.
Dialogue: Let's go.

Original: CELES:Um, I...
Dialogue: Um, I...

Original: LOCKE:Come on.
Dialogue: Come on.

Original: STRAGO:Espers? Espers...Hmm...Not really familiar with that word.
Dialogue: Espers? Espers...Hmm...Not really familiar with that word.

Original: LOCKE:But you've heard it before?
Dialogue: But you've heard it before?

Original: STRAGO:Nope, uhn uhn... Can't say I have. Honestly can't say I have!
Dialogue: Nope, uhn uhn... Can't say I have. Honestly can't say I have!

Original: STRAGO:What in blazes... What're you doing?
Dialogue: What in blazes... What're you doing?

Original: RELM:Grandpa. Who are these people? Friends? Can they use magic, too?
Dialogue: Grandpa. Who are these people? Friends? Can they use magic, too?

Original: STRAGO:Yaa! Hush!
Dialogue: Yaa! Hush!

Original: RELM:What a cute doggy!
Dialogue: What a cute doggy!

Original: SHADOW:Get away. He bites.
Dialogue: Get away. He bites.

Original: STRAGO:Go to your room!
Dialogue: Go to your room!

Original: RELM:I will not! What a fussy old man!
Dialogue: I will not! What a fussy old man!

Original: STRAGO:Please...leave us!
Dialogue: Please...leave us!

Original: RELM:Well...all right...
Dialogue: Well...all right...

Original: RELM:What a sweet puppy!
Dialogue: What a sweet puppy!

Original: STRAGO:Hoo boy... Seems to like your dog...
Dialogue: Hoo boy... Seems to like your dog...

Original: STRAGO:This is terrible...
Dialogue: This is terrible...

Original: SHADOW:No problem. The dog usually doesn't like people, though...
Dialogue: No problem. The dog usually doesn't like people, though...

Original: STRAGO:Please excuse her. She's just young.
Dialogue: Please excuse her. She's just young.

Original: STRAGO:This is just a back-water village. We can tell you nothing about your Espers...
Dialogue: This is just a back-water village. We can tell you nothing about your Espers...

Original: LOCKE:I see... There's something wrong here...
Dialogue: I see... There's something wrong here...

Original: TERRA:Let's have a look around.
Dialogue: Let's have a look around.

Original: LOCKE:Thanks for your time!
Dialogue: Thanks for your time!

Original: STRAGO:Sorry I couldn't have been more helpful!
Dialogue: Sorry I couldn't have been more helpful!

Original: SHADOW:Interceptor! Come!
Dialogue: Interceptor! Come!

Original: RELM:Oh, all right...
Dialogue: Oh, all right...

Original: STRAGO:This is awful! Relm...she's...
Dialogue: This is awful! Relm...she's...

Original: TERRA:Relm's in danger?
Dialogue: Relm's in danger?

Original: STRAGO:Yes! She was at a neighbor's house when a fire broke out. I won't be able to stand it if something happens to her!
Dialogue: Yes! She was at a neighbor's house when a fire broke out. I won't be able to stand it if something happens to her!

Original: STRAGO:Please! Won't you help?!
Dialogue: Please! Won't you help?!

Original: SHADOW:Interceptor... <D>Where are you?!
Dialogue: Interceptor... <D>Where are you?!

Original: STRAGO:Relm's inside that house!
Dialogue: Relm's inside that house!

Original: LOCKE:What're you doing?
Dialogue: What're you doing?

Original: MAYOR:Magic is forbidden!
Dialogue: Magic is forbidden!

Original: STRAGO:I don't care! Relm's inside!!!
Dialogue: I don't care! Relm's inside!!!

Original: MAYOR:All right. We really have no choice.
Dialogue: All right. We really have no choice.

Original: MAYOR:Stand back.
Dialogue: Stand back.

Original: STRAGO:It's no use. The fire's too strong!
Dialogue: It's no use. The fire's too strong!

Original: MAYOR:I think that's because they keep so many Fire Rods in here...
Dialogue: I think that's because they keep so many Fire Rods in here...

Original: STRAGO:I'm going in!
Dialogue: I'm going in!

Original: TERRA:Wait...I'm going too.
Dialogue: Wait...I'm going too.

Original: LOCKE:Count me in. You'd better stay out here, gramps.
Dialogue: Count me in. You'd better stay out here, gramps.

Original: STRAGO:Fool! I may be old, but I'm not powerless!
Dialogue: Fool! I may be old, but I'm not powerless!

Original: LOCKE:Try to avoid the flames.
Dialogue: Try to avoid the flames.

Original: TERRA:Easier said than done.
Dialogue: Easier said than done.

Original: STRAGO:Hurry! We have to find Relm!
Dialogue: Hurry! We have to find Relm!

Original: STRAGO:Relm!!! Where are you?!
Dialogue: Relm!!! Where are you?!

Original: SHADOW:Let's get outta here! <D>I'll use a Smoke Bomb!!
Dialogue: Let's get outta here! <D>I'll use a Smoke Bomb!!

Original: STRAGO:Are you okay?
Dialogue: Are you okay?

Original: RELM:Yes. Thanks, Grandpa!
Dialogue: Yes. Thanks, Grandpa!

Original: STRAGO:Save your thanks for these people.RELM:Thank you...
Dialogue: Save your thanks for these people. RELM Thank you...

Original: STRAGO:I guess our town's little secret is out now...
Dialogue: I guess our town's little secret is out now...

Original: LOCKE:Can everyone here use magic? What's going on here?
Dialogue: Can everyone here use magic? What's going on here?

Original: STRAGO:This is......the village of the Mage Warriors...
Dialogue: This is......the village of the Mage Warriors...

Original: STRAGO:Long ago humans used Magicite to gain magical powers. They came to be known as Mage Warriors.
Dialogue: Long ago humans used Magicite to gain magical powers. They came to be known as Mage Warriors.

Original: LOCKE:But I thought they perished centuries ago...
Dialogue: But I thought they perished centuries ago...

Original: STRAGO:After the War of the Magi, the Espers fled to their new world behind the sealed gate. They wished to live peacefully, without fear of being used by humans. They left us here to fend for ourselves But we were despised by normal people. Everyone felt we had begun that war... They sent people to hunt us down like animals. There weren't even any trials...
Dialogue: After the War of the Magi, the Espers fled to their new world behind the sealed gate. They wished to live peacefully, without fear of being used by humans. They left us here to fend for ourselves… But we were despised by normal people. Everyone felt we had begun that war... They sent people to hunt us down like animals. There weren't even any trials...

Original: TERRA:Even though the only difference was that you could use magic...?
Dialogue: Even though the only difference was that you could use magic...?

Original: STRAGO:A few Mage Warriors escaped and found their way here. They were our ancestors. Our powers have weakened over time, but some of it remains.
Dialogue: A few Mage Warriors escaped and found their way here. They were our ancestors. Our powers have weakened over time, but some of it remains.

Original: TERRA:Look, if you're up to it, we could use your help.
Dialogue: Look, if you're up to it, we could use your help.

Original: STRAGO:So, you're after the Espers, eh...?
Dialogue: So, you're after the Espers, eh...?

Original: STRAGO:Well, I owe you for saving Relm. I'll help you find your Espers.
Dialogue: Well, I owe you for saving Relm. I'll help you find your Espers.

Original: RELM:Me too!
Dialogue: Me too!

Original: STRAGO:I don't think so.
Dialogue: I don't think so.

Original: RELM:What a fuddy duddy...
Dialogue: What a fuddy duddy...

Original: LOCKE:But...where do we start looking?
Dialogue: But...where do we start looking?

Original: STRAGO:Hmm...If they're here, they must be hiding in the mountains to the west.
Dialogue: Hmm...If they're here, they must be hiding in the mountains to the west.

Original: LOCKE:Why there?
Dialogue: Why there?

Original: STRAGO:Those mountains have powerful magical properties. They say the Espers were created there...
Dialogue: Those mountains have powerful magical properties. They say the Espers were created there...

Original: TERRA:Maybe they're drawn to that place?
Dialogue: Maybe they're drawn to that place?

Original: LOCKE:I think it's worth a look.
Dialogue: I think it's worth a look.

Original: SHADOW:Don't misunderstand me. I just wanted my dog back.
Dialogue: Don't misunderstand me. I just wanted my dog back.

Original: LOCKE:Going somewhere?
Dialogue: Going somewhere?

Original: SHADOW:I'll search for the Espers in my own way.
Dialogue: I'll search for the Espers in my own way.

Original: SHADOW:Interceptor! Come!
Dialogue: Interceptor! Come!

Original: STRAGO:I can't believe it... The Statues...!TERRA:"The" Statues?!
Dialogue: I can't believe it... The Statues...! TERRA "The" Statues?!

Original: LOCKE:Some faint letters are carved on the back of the stone figures...
Dialogue: Some faint letters are carved on the back of the stone figures...

Original: LOCKE:Say, old man, what else can you tell us about these goddesses?
Dialogue: Say, old man, what else can you tell us about these goddesses?

Original: STRAGO:They quite literally created magic, as we know it.
Dialogue: They quite literally created magic, as we know it.

Original: LOCKE:So, they're the goddesses of magic, then?
Dialogue: So, they're the goddesses of magic, then?

Original: STRAGO:You could say that.
Dialogue: You could say that.

Original: TERRA:I can feel their power...
Dialogue: I can feel their power...

Original: STRAGO:The Statues are the source of all magic. It's said the Espers made these images, and put them in a very special place. These represent power beyond all comprehension...
Dialogue: The Statues are the source of all magic. It's said the Espers made these images, and put them in a very special place. These represent power beyond all comprehension...

Original: TERRA:Our Espers no doubt came to this island to bask in all this magical power!
Dialogue: Our Espers no doubt came to this island to bask in all this magical power!

Original: LOCKE:Say, old timer, what happened to the stone goddesses?
Dialogue: Say, old timer, what happened to the stone goddesses?

Original: STRAGO:Legend has it that they're hidden somewhere beyond the reach of humans. I'd say they're beyond the sealed gate...
Dialogue: Legend has it that they're hidden somewhere beyond the reach of humans. I'd say they're beyond the sealed gate...

Original: TERRA:I wonder if the barrier that protects that place is generated by those stone goddesses?
Dialogue: I wonder if the barrier that protects that place is generated by those stone goddesses?

Original: LOCKE:Phew...what a story.
Dialogue: Phew...what a story.

Original: TERRA:If the Espers were attracted here by these statues, they must be around here somewhere!
Dialogue: If the Espers were attracted here by these statues, they must be around here somewhere!

Original: LOCKE:I think it's worth a look.
Dialogue: I think it's worth a look.

Original: ULTROS:G'heh, heh...these shiny statues are all mine! These'll get Ziegfried's attention!
Dialogue: G'heh, heh...these shiny statues are all mine! These'll get Ziegfried's attention!

Original: ULTROS:Oh! They're glowing!! They're...beautiful!
Dialogue: Oh! They're glowing!! They're...beautiful!

Original: LOCKE:Hey, squidball! Don't you ever learn?
Dialogue: Hey, squidball! Don't you ever learn?

Original: ULTROS:Uh, well they always said I was a slow learner... but I eat FAST!!
Dialogue: Uh, well they always said I was a slow learner... but I eat FAST!!

Original: RELM:Grandpa! I'm here......!
Dialogue: Grandpa! I'm here......!

Original: STRAGO:Relm! I told you to stay at home!
Dialogue: Relm! I told you to stay at home!

Original: RELM:I couldn't miss the chance to practice my drawing!
Dialogue: I couldn't miss the chance to practice my drawing!

Original: ULTROS:How dare you! I'm Ultros!!
Dialogue: How dare you! I'm Ultros!!

Original: LOCKE:Relm and Ultros......What ARE you doing......?
Dialogue: Relm and Ultros......What ARE you doing......?

Original: RELM:Listen, Ulty...... Why don't you pose for me?
Dialogue: Listen, Ulty...... Why don't you pose for me?

Original: ULTROS:I'm not one of your kiddy friends! Don't talk to me as if I were!! I don't want a portrait!
Dialogue: I'm not one of your kiddy friends! Don't talk to me as if I were!! I don't want a portrait!

Original: RELM:Forget it! I don't wanna draw it anymore!
Dialogue: Forget it! I don't wanna draw it anymore!

Original: RELM:It's okay......I'll just jump down from here.
Dialogue: It's okay......I'll just jump down from here.

Original: TERRA:No!! You can't do that!!!
Dialogue: No!! You can't do that!!!

Original: TERRA:How dare you bother that little girl! I'm not going to forgive you if you hurt her!!
Dialogue: How dare you bother that little girl! I'm not going to forgive you if you hurt her!!

Original: ULTROS:Well, whadduya want I should do?
Dialogue: Well, whadduya want I should do?

Original: LOCKE:Ask her to draw your portrait. She may actually make you look pleasant!
Dialogue: Ask her to draw your portrait. She may actually make you look pleasant!

Original: LOCKE:Don't be so heartless!
Dialogue: Don't be so heartless!

Original: ULTROS:........................................................................Oh, all right, Uncle Ulty REALLY wants you to do his portrait!!!
RELM:Hee, hee, hee... You're gonna love it!
Dialogue: Hee, hee, hee... You're gonna love it!

Original: STRAGO:At any rate, come here!
Dialogue: At any rate, come here!

Original: RELM:Hey! Did you see me? I was awesome! Wouldn't I be more helpful than Gramps?
Dialogue: Hey! Did you see me? I was awesome! Wouldn't I be more helpful than Gramps?

Original: TERRA:I suppose it wouldn't hurt to have you along...
Dialogue: I suppose it wouldn't hurt to have you along...

Original: STRAGO:All right all ready! If you insist...
Dialogue: All right all ready! If you insist...

Original: RELM:That's better!
Dialogue: That's better!

Original: RELM:Are these...Espers?!
Dialogue: Are these...Espers?!

Original: STRAGO:What about you?
Dialogue: What about you?

Original: TERRA:I didn't think they'd look so...
Dialogue: I didn't think they'd look so...

Original: LOCKE:Gramps, take Relm and clear outta here!
Dialogue: Gramps, take Relm and clear outta here!

Original: RELM:What is it?
Dialogue: What is it?

Original: STRAGO:I sense some immense magical power in Terra... It...frightens me...
Dialogue: I sense some immense magical power in Terra... It...frightens me...

Original: LOCKE:I wonder if she's gonna go ballistic again?!
Dialogue: I wonder if she's gonna go ballistic again?!

Original: YURA:You're somehow different... I sense a familiar power radiating from you...
Dialogue: You're somehow different... I sense a familiar power radiating from you...

Original: STRAGO:You're the Espers that fled through the sealed gate?
Dialogue: You're the Espers that fled through the sealed gate?

Original: YURA:As a rule, we are not allowed to visit to your world. We few had gathered near the gate, and were wondering how we could save the Espers that had been kidnapped. It was just a coincidence that Terra appeared when she did...
Dialogue: As a rule, we are not allowed to visit to your world. We few had gathered near the gate, and were wondering how we could save the Espers that had been kidnapped. It was just a coincidence that Terra appeared when she did...

Original: TERRA:I felt...your presence...through the gate.
Dialogue: I felt...your presence...through the gate.

Original: YURA:We bolted the moment Terra opened the gate. But once in your world, we lost control of our powers.
Dialogue: We bolted the moment Terra opened the gate. But once in your world, we lost control of our powers.

Original: YURA:We completely leveled a city...and took some innocent lives...
Dialogue: We completely leveled a city...and took some innocent lives...

Original: TERRA:That's what happened to me! I lost all control of my power...
Dialogue: That's what happened to me! I lost all control of my power...

Original: STRAGO:There must be something in your world that allows you to focus your power differently. You must use caution while in our world...
Dialogue: There must be something in your world that allows you to focus your power differently. You must use caution while in our world...

Original: YURA:We are deeply sorry to have caused you humans such suffering and pain.
Dialogue: We are deeply sorry to have caused you humans such suffering and pain.

Original: LOCKE:The past is history. The Empire seems to want to talk peace with you. Why not come with us?
Dialogue: The past is history. The Empire seems to want to talk peace with you. Why not come with us?

Original: YURA:They would forgive us so easily?
Dialogue: They would forgive us so easily?

Original: LOCKE:Let's go to Thamasa and talk with General Leo.
Dialogue: Let's go to Thamasa and talk with General Leo.

Original: LOCKE:General Leo.
Dialogue: General Leo.

Original: LEO:Locke...you're back! And you've made the Espers understand our desire for peace!
Dialogue: Locke...you're back! And you've made the Espers understand our desire for peace!

Original: LEO:I am General Leo. May I have your name, please?
Dialogue: I am General Leo. May I have your name, please?

Original: YURA:I am called Yura.
Dialogue: I am called Yura.

Original: YURA:We have done something inexcusable to your people. This probably isn't the time or place to ask for your forgiveness, but...
Dialogue: We have done something inexcusable to your people. This probably isn't the time or place to ask for your forgiveness, but...

Original: LEO:Speak no further. It is we who owe you an apology. We hungered for your powerHow close we came to reenacting the War of the Magi!!!
Dialogue: Speak no further. It is we who owe you an apology. We hungered for your power…How close we came to reenacting the War of the Magi!!!

Original: YURA:We must put this all behind us.
Dialogue: We must put this all behind us.

Original: LOCKE:I believe our job is finally over! I, for one, could use some peace and quiet...
Dialogue: I believe our job is finally over! I, for one, could use some peace and quiet...

Original: CELES:Let's return to Vector.
Dialogue: Let's return to Vector.

Original: CELES:Please, not another word.
Dialogue: Please, not another word.

Original: RELM:I'm too hot, Grandpa.
Dialogue: I'm too hot, Grandpa.

Original: KEFKA:Hee, hee...! How 'bout a little Magitek mayhem!
Dialogue: Hee, hee...! How 'bout a little Magitek mayhem!

Original: LEO:Kefka! What ARE you doing?!
Dialogue: Kefka! What ARE you doing?!

Original: KEFKA:G'ha, ha, ha! Emperor's orders! I'm to bring the Magicite remains of these Espers to his excellency! Behold! A Magicite mother lode!!
Dialogue: G'ha, ha, ha! Emperor's orders! I'm to bring the Magicite remains of these Espers to his excellency! Behold! A Magicite mother lode!!

Original: KEFKA:I don't care for the appearance of this pitiful little hamlet...So burn it!!
Dialogue: I don't care for the appearance of this pitiful little hamlet...So burn it!!

Original: LEO:Kefka! No!
Dialogue: Kefka! No!

Original: KEFKA:Shut up!
Dialogue: Shut up!

Original: LEO:Kefka! Your behavior is dishonorable! I can't allow this!
Dialogue: Kefka! Your behavior is dishonorable! I can't allow this!

Original: KEFKA:Ah......Leo......always the consummate soldier......
Dialogue: Ah......Leo......always the consummate soldier......

Original: LEO:: Where are you, Kefka......Show yourself!!
Dialogue: here are you, Kefka......Show yourself!!

Original: KEFKA:EMPEROR GESTAHL......I need you here......
Dialogue: EMPEROR GESTAHL......I need you here......

Original: LEO:: My liege!
Dialogue: y liege!

Original: LEO:: But, Emperor...!
Dialogue: ut, Emperor...!

Original: GESTAHL:Don't say anything. I understand how you feel.
Dialogue: Don't say anything. I understand how you feel.

Original: KEFKA:Uwee, hee, hee......That's right! What we have to do now is to collect Magicite!
Dialogue: Uwee, hee, hee......That's right! What we have to do now is to collect Magicite!

Original: LEO:: But my liege......what have I been fighting for...?
Dialogue: ut my liege......what have I been fighting for...?

Original: GESTAHL:Leo, I'd like you to take a nice, long snooze...! Very long! Uwa, ha!
Dialogue: Leo, I'd like you to take a nice, long snooze...! Very long! Uwa, ha!

Original: KEFKA:So......you think you hit me?! That was simply my shadow! And how did you like my Gestahl? I should've been on the stage! Well, General......
Dialogue: So......you think you hit me?! That was simply my shadow! And how did you like my Gestahl? I should've been on the stage! Well, General......

Original: LEO:: Shut up, Kefka! I oughtta......
Dialogue: hut up, Kefka! I oughtta......

Original: KEFKA:Oh! A threat...? You're such a violent little brute! I'll tell your "liege" I had to exterminate a traitor...!
Dialogue: Oh! A threat...? You're such a violent little brute! I'll tell your "liege" I had to exterminate a traitor...!

Original: KEFKA:Whoa! Yes, I feel some incredible magic power here, today! Wave after wave of pure, magical energy...
Dialogue: Whoa! Yes, I feel some incredible magic power here, today! Wave after wave of pure, magical energy...

Original: KEFKA:I'd say you're all charged up, boys and girls...or whatever...Say, remind me to show you my Magicite collection someday! You might see a few familiar faces!!!
Dialogue: I'd say you're all charged up, boys and girls...or whatever...Say, remind me to show you my Magicite collection someday! You might see a few familiar faces!!!

Original: KEFKA:Now for a little Magicite hocus-pocus...!
Dialogue: Now for a little Magicite hocus-pocus...!

Original: KEFKA:First, let's neutralize your abilities.
Dialogue: First, let's neutralize your abilities.

Original: KEFKA:Now, little Espers... Let's see whatcha got!
Dialogue: Now, little Espers... Let's see whatcha got!

Original: KEFKA:Eh?! You wanna take me on? Fine. Here I am...
Dialogue: Eh?! You wanna take me on? Fine. Here I am...

Original: KEFKA:Imagine! Thinking you could defeat ME!! This is rich! Mwa, ha, ha!
Dialogue: Imagine! Thinking you could defeat ME!! This is rich! Mwa, ha, ha!

Original: KEFKA:Now, my little Magicite pretties......come, and help me build the magical empire of "Kefka"!
Dialogue: Now, my little Magicite pretties......come, and help me build the magical empire of "Kefka"!

Original: KEFKA:G'haw, haw...... Ooh! They're warm to the touch! What treasures!
Dialogue: G'haw, haw...... Ooh! They're warm to the touch! What treasures!

Original: KEFKA:This is ridiculous! I had no idea you were such wimps! Time to put a stop to all of this.
Dialogue: This is ridiculous! I had no idea you were such wimps! Time to put a stop to all of this.

Original: KEFKA:Phew... I think I have plenty of Magicite for the time being... that is, until I make my way through your precious sealed gate!!
Dialogue: Phew... I think I have plenty of Magicite for the time being... that is, until I make my way through your precious sealed gate!!

Original: KEFKA:I dont believe this!
Dialogue: I don’t believe this!

Original: TERRA:General Leo...
Dialogue: General Leo...

Original: TERRA:People only seem to want power. Do they really want to be like me?
Dialogue: People only seem to want power. Do they really want to be like me?

Original: TERRA:I...I wanted to learn so much more from you...
Dialogue: I...I wanted to learn so much more from you...

Original: LOCKE:We not only lost Leo, but Shadow, too... Curse the Empire!
Dialogue: We not only lost Leo, but Shadow, too... Curse the Empire!

Original: LOCKE:This'll have to do...
Dialogue: This'll have to do...

Original: CELES:He was so gentle...
Dialogue: He was so gentle...

Original: RELM:Ill go with you.
Dialogue: I’ll go with you.

Original: LOCKE:Now I'm worried about Edgar and the others...
Dialogue: Now I'm worried about Edgar and the others...

Original: TERRA:I wish I could say they were safe...
Dialogue: I wish I could say they were safe...

Original: SETZER:We've been had!! The Emperor is a liar!
Dialogue: We've been had!! The Emperor is a liar!

Original: CYAN:Thanks to Edgar, we escaped before anything bad happened...
Dialogue: Thanks to Edgar, we escaped before anything bad happened...

Original: LOCKE:Way to go, Edgar!
Dialogue: Way to go, Edgar!

Original: EDGAR:I got to know the gal who brought us tea. After a while, she just blurted out the whole crooked plan.
Dialogue: I got to know the gal who brought us tea. After a while, she just blurted out the whole crooked plan.

Original: SABIN:So...you finally hit pay dirt, eh?
Dialogue: So...you finally hit pay dirt, eh?

Original: EDGAR:Watch your mouth! There're ladies present! I was a perfect gentleman.
Dialogue: Watch your mouth! There're ladies present! I was a perfect gentleman.

Original: LOCKE:General Leo's gone...Kefka did him in...
Dialogue: General Leo's gone...Kefka did him in...

Original: CYAN:Sir Leo?! Gone?! What a waste...He was their finest soldier...
Dialogue: Sir Leo?! Gone?! What a waste...He was their finest soldier...

Original: EDGAR:We need to rethink our plans. Let's return to the airship.
Dialogue: We need to rethink our plans. Let's return to the airship.

Original: STRAGO:May I accompany you?
Dialogue: May I accompany you?

Original: EDGAR:Who're you?
Dialogue: Who're you?

Original: LOCKE:He's one of this town's citizens.
Dialogue: He's one of this town's citizens.

Original: TERRA:He's descended from the Mage Warriors of yore... I think he can be a big help.
Dialogue: He's descended from the Mage Warriors of yore... I think he can be a big help.

Original: STRAGO:We must expect the Empire to flex its new-found muscle soon.
Dialogue: We must expect the Empire to flex its new-found muscle soon.

Original: RELM:I'm coming along, too.
Dialogue: I'm coming along, too.

Original: SABIN:Yeah, right kid!
Dialogue: Yeah, right kid!

Original: RELM:What? Who is this puffed up aerobics instructor, anyway?
Dialogue: What? Who is this puffed up aerobics instructor, anyway?

Original: SABIN:Kid's got quite a lip!
Dialogue: Kid's got quite a lip!

Original: RELM:Aaack! I'm gonna paint your portrait!
Dialogue: Aaack! I'm gonna paint your portrait!

Original: STRAGO:All right all ready! If you insist...
Dialogue: All right all ready! If you insist...

Original: RELM:That's better!
Dialogue: That's better!

Original: SABIN:Lets go!
Dialogue: Let’s go!

Original: RELM:What's wrong, lover boy?
Dialogue: What's wrong, lover boy?

Original: EDGAR:How old are you?
Dialogue: How old are you?

Original: RELM:I'm coming along, too.
Dialogue: I'm coming along, too.

Original: EDGAR:You've grown up entirely too fast! Lighten up, okay?!
Dialogue: You've grown up entirely too fast! Lighten up, okay?!

Original: SETZER:The Empire's after the sealed gate! They're looking for some statues or something.
Dialogue: The Empire's after the sealed gate! They're looking for some statues or something.

Original: GESTAHL:Oh, those silly Espers! To think they opened the gate themselves! The Statues should be just ahead. If we can just get our hands on them, we'll have everything we ever dreamed of!
Dialogue: Oh, those silly Espers! To think they opened the gate themselves! The Statues should be just ahead. If we can just get our hands on them, we'll have everything we ever dreamed of!

Original: GESTAHL:Come quickly!
Dialogue: Come quickly!

Original: CELES:What's wrong, Terra?
Dialogue: What's wrong, Terra?

Original: TERRA:The island... The world is groaning in pain...
Dialogue: The island... The world is groaning in pain...

Original: GESTAHL:Fuwa, ha, ha! Now THIS is power! This, and my Magicite... now nothing can stop me!
Dialogue: Fuwa, ha, ha! Now THIS is power! This, and my Magicite... now nothing can stop me!

Original: STRAGO:The beginning of all magic...
Dialogue: The beginning of all magic...

Original: STRAGO:It is said that they somehow neutralized each other's power, then sealed themselves away... the 3 statues should ever be moved out of alignment, the resulting inbalance of power would... ...rearrange the face of our planet...
Dialogue: It is said that they somehow neutralized each other's power, then sealed themselves away... the 3 statues should ever be moved out of alignment, the resulting inbalance of power would... ...rearrange the face of our planet...

Original: SETZER:Quick! Let's jump onto that thing!
Dialogue: Quick! Let's jump onto that thing!

Original: SHADOW:Down with the Empire! Once I outlived my usefulness, they tried to off me!
Dialogue: Down with the Empire! Once I outlived my usefulness, they tried to off me!

Original: SHADOW:Is Interceptor all right?
Dialogue: Is Interceptor all right?

Original: SHADOW:Forget about me.
Dialogue: Forget about me.

Original: SHADOW:I sold my skills to the Empire... I have no right to fight together with you.
Dialogue: I sold my skills to the Empire... I have no right to fight together with you.

Original: GESTAHL:Well, well...
Dialogue: Well, well...

Original: CELES:I came to stop you!
Dialogue: I came to stop you!

Original: GESTAHL:Fwa, ha, ha... Then you're just in time to perish. Behold! The Statues!!
Dialogue: Fwa, ha, ha... Then you're just in time to perish. Behold! The Statues!!

Original: GESTAHL:Ooh! I've got goose bumps! What power...
Dialogue: Ooh! I've got goose bumps! What power...

Original: CELES:Emperor Gestahl! Please, stop this madness!
Dialogue: Emperor Gestahl! Please, stop this madness!

Original: GESTAHL:Celes... Come to me, my pretty! You and Kefka were given life to serve me!! It is your birthright to rule the world with me!!
Dialogue: Celes... Come to me, my pretty! You and Kefka were given life to serve me!! It is your birthright to rule the world with me!!

Original: KEFKA:Kill the others and we'll overlook your treachery!
Dialogue: Kill the others and we'll overlook your treachery!

Original: KEFKA:Take this sword! Take care of them. Immediately!!
Dialogue: Take this sword! Take care of them. Immediately!!

Original: GESTAHL:Celes...together we can rule an entire world! Think of it...!
Dialogue: Celes...together we can rule an entire world! Think of it...!

Original: CELES:Power only breeds war... I wish I'd never been...born.
Dialogue: Power only breeds war... I wish I'd never been...born.

Original: KEFKA:You...vicious brat! Grrr... Aargh... I hate hate hate hate hate hate...hate hate hate hate hate hate hate hate hate hate HATE YOU! Grrr...
Dialogue: You...vicious brat! Grrr... Aargh... I hate hate hate hate hate hate...hate hate hate hate hate hate hate hate hate hate HATE YOU! Grrr...

Original: KEFKA:Goddesses...you were born only to fight. I implore you...show me your power!!
Dialogue: Goddesses...you were born only to fight. I implore you...show me your power!!

Original: KEFKA:I command you! Give me your power! Arrrgh! Curses!
Dialogue: I command you! Give me your power! Arrrgh! Curses!

Original: KEFKA:Listen to me, or you'll regret it! Give me...POWER!
Dialogue: Listen to me, or you'll regret it! Give me...POWER!

Original: GESTAHL:Kefka, stop it! Revive those statues, and you'll destroy the very world we're trying to possess!
Dialogue: Kefka, stop it! Revive those statues, and you'll destroy the very world we're trying to possess!

Original: GESTAHL:Kefka! Are you nuts?!
Dialogue: Kefka! Are you nuts?!

Original: KEFKA:Nuts...?! Emperor! Don't disturb me! I'm showing them the meaning of power!
Dialogue: Nuts...?! Emperor! Don't disturb me! I'm showing them the meaning of power!

Original: GESTAHL:I don't think so, friend. Your days are now over.
Dialogue: I don't think so, friend. Your days are now over.

Original: GESTAHL:Now relax......I'm simply going to put you to sleep with the very power you unleashed......
Dialogue: Now relax......I'm simply going to put you to sleep with the very power you unleashed......

Original: GESTAHL:What's so funny?!
Dialogue: What's so funny?!

Original: GESTAHL:Very well. It is only fitting that you go to sleep laughing!
Dialogue: Very well. It is only fitting that you go to sleep laughing!

Original: GESTAHL:N......noooo!! Why isn't my magic working?!
Dialogue: N......noooo!! Why isn't my magic working?!

Original: GESTAHL:K......Kefka!!!!! H......how...?!
GESTAHL:How are you doing this?!
Dialogue: How are you doing this?!

Original: KEFKA:How? Simple! I'm standing within the field of the Statues! Their strong field absorbs all magic sent their way! Or didn't you notice?!
Dialogue: How? Simple! I'm standing within the field of the Statues! Their strong field absorbs all magic sent their way! Or didn't you notice?!

Original: KEFKA:And now, Statues! You've shown me a sign! It is time you show this old man your true power!
Dialogue: And now, Statues! You've shown me a sign! It is time you show this old man your true power!

Original: GESTAHL:No! Kefka!! Don't do something stupid......
Dialogue: No! Kefka!! Don't do something stupid......

Original: KEFKA:I command you, Statues!!!
Dialogue: I command you, Statues!!!

Original: KEFKA:You're way off!!!! Where're you aiming?!
Dialogue: You're way off!!!! Where're you aiming?!

Original: KEFKA:Whoa! More to the right!
Dialogue: Whoa! More to the right!

Original: KEFKA:Run! Run! Or you'll be well done!
Dialogue: Run! Run! Or you'll be well done!

Original: KEFKA:Poor old......Oh well, what a worthless excuse of an Emperor!!
Dialogue: Poor old......Oh well, what a worthless excuse of an Emperor!!

Original: GESTAHL:There'll be no one to worship us...
Dialogue: There'll be no one to worship us...

Original: CELES:Snap out of it, Kefka!
Dialogue: Snap out of it, Kefka!

Original: CELES:Oh, that's really smart, Kefka! Disturb their delicate balance, and they'll go haywire...!
Dialogue: Oh, that's really smart, Kefka! Disturb their delicate balance, and they'll go haywire...!

Original: KEFKA:Who're you?!
Dialogue: Who're you?!

Original: SHADOW:Go! There are people counting on you!
Dialogue: Go! There are people counting on you!

Original: SHADOW:Don't worry about me! Run!! I can't stop this chain reaction! I'll see you again. Count on it!
Dialogue: Don't worry about me! Run!! I can't stop this chain reaction! I'll see you again. Count on it!

Original: KEFKA:You can't escape me!!
Dialogue: You can't escape me!!

Original: SETZER:Hang on!
Dialogue: Hang on!

Original: CID:Celes...at last...!
Dialogue: Celes...at last...!

Original: CID:You're finally awake!
Dialogue: You're finally awake!

Original: CELES:I...feel like I've been sleeping for ever...
Dialogue: I...feel like I've been sleeping for ever...

Original: CID:For one year, actually... I thought you were out for good.
Dialogue: For one year, actually... I thought you were out for good.

Original: CELES:A whole year...You've watched over me the whole time?
Dialogue: A whole year...You've watched over me the whole time?

Original: CID:Yes, and I'm about out of energy.
Dialogue: Yes, and I'm about out of energy.

Original: CID:We're on a tiny, deserted island. After the world crumbled, I awoke to find us here together with......a few strangers.
Dialogue: We're on a tiny, deserted island. After the world crumbled, I awoke to find us here together with......a few strangers.

Original: CELES:The world...! So, it wasn't just a dream.
Dialogue: The world...! So, it wasn't just a dream.

Original: CELES:Where are my friends? Where's Locke...?
Dialogue: Where are my friends? Where's Locke...?

Original: CID:I don't know. I only know we're here... Maybe we're the only people left alive...Since that day, the world's continued its slide into ruin. Animals and plants are dying...The few others who washed up here with us passed away of boredom and despair.
Dialogue: I don't know. I only know we're here... Maybe we're the only people left alive...Since that day, the world's continued its slide into ruin. Animals and plants are dying...The few others who washed up here with us passed away of boredom and despair.

Original: CELES:My friends...they're probably all gone...
Dialogue: My friends...they're probably all gone...

Original: CID:Celes...you're the closest thing to family that I have...we could just live out our lives here peacefully...
Dialogue: Celes...you're the closest thing to family that I have...we could just live out our lives here peacefully...

Original: CELES:I suppose so, Cid...Or should I say, Granddad?! May I call you that?
Dialogue: I suppose so, Cid...Or should I say, Granddad?! May I call you that?

Original: CID:Gramps, eh? I'm overwhelmed! All of a sudden I have a granddaughter! Cough... Wheeze...
Dialogue: Gramps, eh? I'm overwhelmed! All of a sudden I have a granddaughter! Cough... Wheeze...

Original: CELES:My long-lost Granddad...
Dialogue: My long-lost Granddad...

Original: CID:Ha, ha...hack...cough!CELES:Hey, are you hungry?
Dialogue: Ha, ha...hack...cough! CELES Hey, are you hungry?

Original: CID:I...haven't eaten in 3 or so days, ever since I became ill.
Dialogue: I...haven't eaten in 3 or so days, ever since I became ill.

Original: CELES:What would you like?
Dialogue: What would you like?

Original: CID:Well, unless I ask for fish, I won't get anything! That's all there is here!CELES:I'll go catch some.
Dialogue: Well, unless I ask for fish, I won't get anything! That's all there is here! CELES I'll go catch some.

Original: SABIN:If I move...The whole house'll collapse. First... save the child that's in there...I can't hold this up forever, so...Get out on the hum...urgh...
Dialogue: If I move...The whole house'll collapse. First... save the child that's in there...I can't hold this up forever, so...Get out on the hum...urgh...

Original: SABIN:But of course! You think a minor thing like the end of the world was gonna do me in?
Dialogue: But of course! You think a minor thing like the end of the world was gonna do me in?

Original: SABIN:I know, I know...We smash Kefka, and deliver peace unto the world...
Dialogue: I know, I know...We smash Kefka, and deliver peace unto the world...

Original: GERAD:What's your problem?
Dialogue: What's your problem?

Original: CELES:Y... you're Edgar, aren't you?!
Dialogue: Y... you're Edgar, aren't you?!

Original: GERAD:Enough of this nonsense! I have things to do.
Dialogue: Enough of this nonsense! I have things to do.

Original: GERAD:I'll be busy getting ready for our departure to Figaro.
Dialogue: I'll be busy getting ready for our departure to Figaro.

Original: CELES:Don't play possum with me! Edgar? Or have you somehow lost your memory?
Dialogue: Don't play possum with me! Edgar? Or have you somehow lost your memory?

Original: GERAD:Listen, my lady, I've been "Gerad" all my life!
Dialogue: Listen, my lady, I've been "Gerad" all my life!

Original: CELES:Only Edgar would say, "my lady."
Dialogue: Only Edgar would say, "my lady."

Original: GERAD:What's all the bloomin' fuss about? The words, "my lady" are used the world over!
Dialogue: What's all the bloomin' fuss about? The words, "my lady" are used the world over!

Original: GERAD:Oh, yeah, you know how to get into Figaro Castle, don't you?!
Dialogue: Oh, yeah, you know how to get into Figaro Castle, don't you?!

Original: HENCHMAN:G'ho ho, do we ever!
Dialogue: G'ho ho, do we ever!

Original: GERAD:Yeah, You lead the way since it's buried.
Dialogue: Yeah, You lead the way since it's buried.

Original: GERAD:Let's go help 'em... Hang on a sec... ......? Are you people STILL here?
Dialogue: Let's go help 'em... Hang on a sec... ......? Are you people STILL here?

Original: CELES:Be polite now... Edgar!
Dialogue: Be polite now... Edgar!

Original: GERAD:Case of mistaken identity, my dear. Give it up!
Dialogue: Case of mistaken identity, my dear. Give it up!

Original: SIGFRIED:Pretty dangerous from here on. I'll go in first and clear out all the monsters. Wait here.
Dialogue: Pretty dangerous from here on. I'll go in first and clear out all the monsters. Wait here.

Original: GERAD:Now, where were we...?
Dialogue: Now, where were we...?

Original: GERAD:Good Job! I used to have a turtle...!
Dialogue: Good Job! I used to have a turtle...!

Original: GERAD:You all right? You were almost a goner.
Dialogue: You all right? You were almost a goner.

Original: GERAD:Here's the problem... What a mess...
Dialogue: Here's the problem... What a mess...

Original: GERAD:You guys get in there while I keep this thing busy!
Dialogue: You guys get in there while I keep this thing busy!

Original: GERAD:Get going!
Dialogue: Get going!

Original: EDGAR:What're ya waiting for, Celes? Give me a hand!!
Dialogue: What're ya waiting for, Celes? Give me a hand!!

Original: CELES:Edgar! It IS you!
Dialogue: Edgar! It IS you!

Original: CELES:Why the stupid farce?
Dialogue: Why the stupid farce?

Original: EDGAR:Well, I heard that Figaro had had an accident. I wanted to help, but didn't know where to look. Then I heard that those idiots had escaped from the prison.
Dialogue: Well, I heard that Figaro had had an accident. I wanted to help, but didn't know where to look. Then I heard that those idiots had escaped from the prison.

Original: CELES:You needed to use them...
Dialogue: You needed to use them...

Original: EDGAR:Bingo. I had to wait until they led me to their secret cave.
Dialogue: Bingo. I had to wait until they led me to their secret cave.

Original: CELES:Amazing, considering that you threw most of 'em in jail to begin with!
Dialogue: Amazing, considering that you threw most of 'em in jail to begin with!

Original: EDGAR:Uh, oh...! Let's hide!
Dialogue: Uh, oh...! Let's hide!

Original: PARTY:"You don't want that treasure back...?"EDGAR:It's completely worthless. Besides, Kefka's the one we need to worry about. Those guys haven't committed any serious crimes...
Dialogue: "You don't want that treasure back...?" EDGAR It's completely worthless. Besides, Kefka's the one we need to worry about. Those guys haven't committed any serious crimes...

Original: CELES:Come on, let's go...
Dialogue: Come on, let's go...

Original: CELES:Setzer!SETZER:You're alive!?
Dialogue: Setzer! SETZER You're alive!?

Original: CELES:Come along with us! We're after Kefka!
Dialogue: Come along with us! We're after Kefka!

Original: SETZER:Phew... I don't know if I have it in me anymore...
Dialogue: Phew... I don't know if I have it in me anymore...

Original: CELES:What are you saying?!SETZER:I'm just a gambler...I just want to be left alone...This world is too chaotic for me. What's worse, I've lost my wings...
Dialogue: What are you saying?! SETZER I'm just a gambler...I just want to be left alone...This world is too chaotic for me. What's worse, I've lost my wings...

Original: CELES:But before the world collapsed, you fought with all your heart! You were absolutely fearless...
Dialogue: But before the world collapsed, you fought with all your heart! You were absolutely fearless...

Original: SETZER:That was then... We can never have that world back!
Dialogue: That was then... We can never have that world back!

Original: CELES:You want to live in this world as it is? No? Then do something about it!
Dialogue: You want to live in this world as it is? No? Then do something about it!

Original: SETZER:Mwa ha!All right...you win! I'm starting to feel lucky!!
Dialogue: Mwa ha!All right...you win! I'm starting to feel lucky!!

Original: SETZER:Thanks... I needed that. Now, let's go visit Daryl's Tomb.
Dialogue: Thanks... I needed that. Now, let's go visit Daryl's Tomb.

Original: SETZER:......We're gonna get us another one... Airship, that is...!
Dialogue: ......We're gonna get us another one... Airship, that is...!

Original: CELES:This person...She was your friend?
Dialogue: This person...She was your friend?

Original: SETZER:Yeah. She was a piece of work. Nothing scared her...
Dialogue: Yeah. She was a piece of work. Nothing scared her...

Original: SETZER:Could be anything lurking down here, so keep your eyes peeled!
Dialogue: Could be anything lurking down here, so keep your eyes peeled!

Original: SETZER:This brings back a lot of memories.
Dialogue: This brings back a lot of memories.

Original: DARYL:This experimental airship is probably a bit unstable...
Dialogue: This experimental airship is probably a bit unstable...

Original: SETZER:You can't be serious! What are you trying to prove?!
Dialogue: You can't be serious! What are you trying to prove?!

Original: SETZER:Watch your step.
Dialogue: Watch your step.

Original: DARYL:If something should happen to me, the Falcon's yours!
Dialogue: If something should happen to me, the Falcon's yours!

Original: SETZER:Nonsense! I'll win the Falcon from you when I whip you in a race! You'd better clear outta my way!
Dialogue: Nonsense! I'll win the Falcon from you when I whip you in a race! You'd better clear outta my way!

Original: DARYL:Big talk, buster!
Dialogue: Big talk, buster!

Original: SETZER:There's nothing like flying!
Dialogue: There's nothing like flying!

Original: DARYL:Come on! Stop lagging back there!
Dialogue: Come on! Stop lagging back there!

Original: DARYL:Or do you like chewing on my wake!
Dialogue: Or do you like chewing on my wake!

Original: SETZER:Listen to you!
Dialogue: Listen to you!

Original: DARYL:This time's for real. I'm going to break every record! I'll be known as the woman who flew closest to the stars!
Dialogue: This time's for real. I'm going to break every record! I'll be known as the woman who flew closest to the stars!

Original: SETZER:Be back before sunset! I'll be waiting for you on our hill.
Dialogue: Be back before sunset! I'll be waiting for you on our hill.

Original: SETZER:I restored the craft, and then put it to rest down here.
Dialogue: I restored the craft, and then put it to rest down here.

Original: EDGAR:This is THE Falcon?
Dialogue: This is THE Falcon?

Original: SETZER:I put it in storage. I couldn't bear to look at it. But now it just may save us... The Falcon.
Dialogue: I put it in storage. I couldn't bear to look at it. But now it just may save us... The Falcon.

Original: EDGAR:I finally think we're gonna pull this off!
Dialogue: I finally think we're gonna pull this off!

Original: CELES:We can attack Kefka's tower from the air!
Dialogue: We can attack Kefka's tower from the air!

Original: EDGAR:The Falcon's going to give us one last chance at that guy...
Dialogue: The Falcon's going to give us one last chance at that guy...

Original: SETZER:But first we need to find our friends!
Dialogue: But first we need to find our friends!

Original: EDGAR:Right. First things first. For once I feel hopeful!
Dialogue: Right. First things first. For once I feel hopeful!

Original: CELES:Hey! A bird!
Dialogue: Hey! A bird!

Original: CELES:Setzer! Follow that bird!
Dialogue: Setzer! Follow that bird!

Original: SETZER:But why?
Dialogue: But why?

Original: CELES:I...don't know...! Something inside just tells me it's important...
Dialogue: I...don't know...! Something inside just tells me it's important...

Original: LOLA:Look! My boyfriend in Mobliz sent me all these flowers! They're all hand-made of silk. And these are letters he has written to me...
Dialogue: Look! My boyfriend in Mobliz sent me all these flowers! They're all hand-made of silk. And these are letters he has written to me...

Original: LOLA:Could you please attach this reply to a carrier pigeon?
Dialogue: Could you please attach this reply to a carrier pigeon?

Original: LOLA:Thank you.
Dialogue: Thank you.

Original: CYAN:Hey!! You're alive!?
Dialogue: Hey!! You're alive!?

Original: CYAN:I shall go with you! I shan't leave the world as it is! But how did you find me? W...wait! Tell me you didn't read my letters...!!
