Dialogue: I shall go with you! I shan't leave the world as it is! But how did you find me? W...wait! Tell me you didn't read my letters...!!

Original: CYAN:These... they're... um... Merely a diversion of mine...
Dialogue: These... they're... um... Merely a diversion of mine...

Original: CYAN:Mm...m...!? This is an outrage...!
Dialogue: Mm...m...!? This is an outrage...!

Original: CYAN:I learned of that poor girl when I passed through Maranda. When I heard that she sent a letter each day, but never received any replies... Something inside me snapped...
Dialogue: I learned of that poor girl when I passed through Maranda. When I heard that she sent a letter each day, but never received any replies... Something inside me snapped...

Original: CYAN:As I wrote to that girl, I realized I was very much like her. I was looking behind...full of despair. My eyes were closed... And then something changed...
Dialogue: As I wrote to that girl, I realized I was very much like her. I was looking behind...full of despair. My eyes were closed... And then something changed...

Original: OWZER:P...please... Help that painting!!
Dialogue: P...please... Help that painting!!

Original: OWZER:It's...there's a monster hiding in my prized painting of a goddess...
Dialogue: It's...there's a monster hiding in my prized painting of a goddess...

Original: OWZER:Yes... And now it's nearly impossible to get it to show itself...
Dialogue: Yes... And now it's nearly impossible to get it to show itself...

Original: OWZER:Relm! We can't attack this masterpiece! It would be inexcusable!
Dialogue: Relm! We can't attack this masterpiece! It would be inexcusable!

Original: CHADARNOOK:G'fu, fu, fu... Who're these numbskulls? No one...NO ONE...is going to remove me from this fine new painting!!
Dialogue: G'fu, fu, fu... Who're these numbskulls? No one...NO ONE...is going to remove me from this fine new painting!!

Original: DEMON:The girl in the picture is mine! You can't have her!
Dialogue: The girl in the picture is mine! You can't have her!

Original: RELM:Hey! Relax! The monster croaked!
Dialogue: Hey! Relax! The monster croaked!

Original: OWZER:Thanks for saving the day! This picture's more precious to me than my own life!
Dialogue: Thanks for saving the day! This picture's more precious to me than my own life!

Original: RELM:Huh?! What are you talking about?
Dialogue: Huh?! What are you talking about?

Original: OWZER:It all started when I bought a stone at the Auction House. I took one look at it and suddenly felt I needed a portrait of Starlet. I asked several artists, but none could muster enough skill. It was then that I heard about Relm's amazing ability. I brought her here, and put her to work. But while she was painting, that thing came along... It must have been enticed here by that stone.
Dialogue: It all started when I bought a stone at the Auction House. I took one look at it and suddenly felt I needed a portrait of Starlet. I asked several artists, but none could muster enough skill. It was then that I heard about Relm's amazing ability. I brought her here, and put her to work. But while she was painting, that thing came along... It must have been enticed here by that stone.

Original: OWZER:The stone? Over on that bookshelf.
Dialogue: The stone? Over on that bookshelf.

Original: OWZER:Phew. I don't need any more bad luck. Just take it and go!
Dialogue: Phew. I don't need any more bad luck. Just take it and go!

Original: RELM:I have to go! But fear not, I'll be back to finish this painting!
Dialogue: I have to go! But fear not, I'll be back to finish this painting!

Original: OWZER:I'll be waiting for you!
Dialogue: I'll be waiting for you!

Original: RELM:You!! You old fool!!! You're still standing?!
Dialogue: You!! You old fool!!! You're still standing?!

Original: STRAGO:Relm! Is that you, my dear? You're alive!!
Dialogue: Relm! Is that you, my dear? You're alive!!

Original: RELM:Idiot! Of course I'm all right!
Dialogue: Idiot! Of course I'm all right!

Original: STRAGO:Oh...I'm so happy...
Dialogue: Oh...I'm so happy...

Original: RELM:Did you think I was gonna check out before you, old man?! <D>Ah, ha, ha...
Dialogue: Did you think I was gonna check out before you, old man?! <D>Ah, ha, ha...

Original: STRAGO:You're as foul-mouthed as ever, bless your heart!
Dialogue: You're as foul-mouthed as ever, bless your heart!

Original: RELM:Come along now...We're all glad to see you!
Dialogue: Come along now...We're all glad to see you!

Original: STRAGO:Whoa! Well I'll be... All right, make room for me!
Dialogue: Whoa! Well I'll be... All right, make room for me!

Original: SHADOW: The only thing I know how to do is fight...
Dialogue: he only thing I know how to do is fight...

Original: PARTY:"Why not come with us?"SHADOW:Well...
Dialogue: "Why not come with us?" SHADOW Well...

Original: SHADOW:First I need to see how far I can get here...
Dialogue: First I need to see how far I can get here...

Original: TERRA:Oh! I'm so glad to see that you're safe! I've missed you!
Dialogue: Oh! I'm so glad to see that you're safe! I've missed you!

Original: TERRA:That is I... um...I can't fight any longer...
Dialogue: That is I... um...I can't fight any longer...

Original: TERRA:The very day the world fell, Kefka turned some kind of beam on this town. Almost all of the adults perished trying to save their children...
Dialogue: The very day the world fell, Kefka turned some kind of beam on this town. Almost all of the adults perished trying to save their children...

Original: TERRA:There were only children here... The moment I arrived, I felt needed...
Dialogue: There were only children here... The moment I arrived, I felt needed...

Original: DUANE:You can't take Terra away!
Dialogue: You can't take Terra away!

Original: KATARIN:Duane... Please excuse him. It's just that if Terra goes, she takes with her the very spirit of our survival...
Dialogue: Duane... Please excuse him. It's just that if Terra goes, she takes with her the very spirit of our survival...

Original: TERRA:I don't know why these kids need me...But they've made me feel things I've never felt before. The moment I sensed this, I lost my will to fight.
Dialogue: I don't know why these kids need me...But they've made me feel things I've never felt before. The moment I sensed this, I lost my will to fight.

Original: TERRA:I can honestly say I don't know what's going on inside of me...And the more I try to understand it, the less inclined I am to fight.
Dialogue: I can honestly say I don't know what's going on inside of me...And the more I try to understand it, the less inclined I am to fight.

Original: TERRA:Phunbaba's an ancient demon who was released when the world was undone.
Dialogue: Phunbaba's an ancient demon who was released when the world was undone.

Original: TERRA:I've really lost it... My fighting edge...
Dialogue: I've really lost it... My fighting edge...

Original: TERRA:I'm staying here. As you can see, I can't be of any help to you. And besides, the children really need me.PARTY:"But Terra...!"
Dialogue: I'm staying here. As you can see, I can't be of any help to you. And besides, the children really need me. PARTY "But Terra...!"

Original: TERRA:Maybe after a little more time passes...I need to understand what's happening to me...
Dialogue: Maybe after a little more time passes...I need to understand what's happening to me...

Original: TERRA:Hey you guys!
Dialogue: Hey you guys!

Original: TERRA:Katarin's having a baby.
Dialogue: Katarin's having a baby.

Original: KATARIN:I'm so happy to have had a child...But Duane seems miserable...
Dialogue: I'm so happy to have had a child...But Duane seems miserable...

Original: DUANE:Katarin... ... I'm sorry. I didn't know how to handle this. I've been an awful husband... But I'm learning. Please, come back with me.
Dialogue: Katarin... ... I'm sorry. I didn't know how to handle this. I've been an awful husband... But I'm learning. Please, come back with me.

Original: TERRA:I...I can fight!
Dialogue: I...I can fight!

Original: TERRA:Finally...I understand that feeling...Even though I kept it buried for so long. I'm sure it's called... ...... ...... "Love!" I now realize that we must fight for the future of our children.
Dialogue: Finally...I understand that feeling...Even though I kept it buried for so long. I'm sure it's called... ...... ...... "Love!" I now realize that we must fight for the future of our children.

Original: TERRA:Duane... Katarin needs your help... so does your new baby. Listen children, your "Mama" has to go away for a while. I'll return when I feel your future's guaranteed!
Dialogue: Duane... Katarin needs your help... so does your new baby. Listen children, your "Mama" has to go away for a while. I'll return when I feel your future's guaranteed!

Original: TERRA:I'll be back. I promise! Till then...you behave!
Dialogue: I'll be back. I promise! Till then...you behave!

Original: TERRA:Thank you... You helped me to understand a part of myself. Now I must go to war. We must all believe we have a future. We must fight for those who aren't even born yet!
Dialogue: Thank you... You helped me to understand a part of myself. Now I must go to war. We must all believe we have a future. We must fight for those who aren't even born yet!

Original: LOCKE:You're all safe! Behold...A legendary relic that can restore life...
Dialogue: You're all safe! Behold...A legendary relic that can restore life...

Original: LOCKE:Correct! Legend has it that ages ago the Phoenix was turned to stone...And many legends are based on facts...This has some major cracks in it though...I fear it may have lost its power over time...
Dialogue: Correct! Legend has it that ages ago the Phoenix was turned to stone...And many legends are based on facts...This has some major cracks in it though...I fear it may have lost its power over time...

Original: CELES:Locke...That's for Rachel, isn't it...?
Dialogue: Locke...That's for Rachel, isn't it...?

Original: LOCKE:I wasn't able to save Rachel...I've lost all sense of purpose...My life will have no meaning until I can right this terrible wrong...
Dialogue: I wasn't able to save Rachel...I've lost all sense of purpose...My life will have no meaning until I can right this terrible wrong...

Original: PATRIARCH:If only the Magicite didn't bear those deep cracks...I think you've been wasting your time, young man!
Dialogue: If only the Magicite didn't bear those deep cracks...I think you've been wasting your time, young man!

Original: PATRIARCH:Uwaaaaaa! The Magicite's gonna shatter!
Dialogue: Uwaaaaaa! The Magicite's gonna shatter!

Original: RACHEL:Locke...I've dreamed of seeing you.I wanted to hear your voice.
Dialogue: Locke...I've dreamed of seeing you.I wanted to hear your voice.

Original: RACHEL:The Phoenix has given me so little time...I have to leave again soon...But I have something I must tell you...
Dialogue: The Phoenix has given me so little time...I have to leave again soon...But I have something I must tell you...

Original: RACHEL:Locke... ... With you I was so happy...In the instant that the accident occurred, I thought only of you...And about the joy you brought me. Thank you, Locke...I'll never forget you...
Dialogue: Locke... ... With you I was so happy...In the instant that the accident occurred, I thought only of you...And about the joy you brought me. Thank you, Locke...I'll never forget you...

Original: RACHEL:I have to go now... ...I'll always love you...You must now cast off the anguish you've been harboring inside for so long... Today I set your heart free. You must learn to love yourself again, and regain your self respect....... Phoenix! Be reborn again!! And give your power...to Locke!!
Dialogue: I have to go now... ...I'll always love you...You must now cast off the anguish you've been harboring inside for so long... Today I set your heart free. You must learn to love yourself again, and regain your self respect....... Phoenix! Be reborn again!! And give your power...to Locke!!

Original: LOCKE:Thanks, I'm okay...I feel lighter than air...From here on...I'll be all right. Let's go! We have work to do!!
Dialogue: Thanks, I'm okay...I feel lighter than air...From here on...I'll be all right. Let's go! We have work to do!!

Original: CELES:What's up?
Dialogue: What's up?

Original: LOCKE:The treasures of the Phoenix Cave!
Dialogue: The treasures of the Phoenix Cave!

Original: LOCKE:Right, let's move out! We have an appointment with Kefka!
Dialogue: Right, let's move out! We have an appointment with Kefka!

Original: PICKPOCKET:Eh!? What're you doing here? Doesn't matter, really... nothing left anyway...There's only one Moogle still around, and only a treasure hunter could pick that lock...
Dialogue: Eh!? What're you doing here? Doesn't matter, really... nothing left anyway...There's only one Moogle still around, and only a treasure hunter could pick that lock...

Original: MOG:Kupoppo! You're alive! I thought you were all feeding the worms, kupo! Kupohoho! Let's go!
Dialogue: Kupoppo! You're alive! I thought you were all feeding the worms, kupo! Kupohoho! Let's go!

Original: MOG:Say, we could use some sasquatch muscle!! Besides, he'd be helpless here without me! He's somewhere in the mines. Once we find him, I'll order him to join us!
Dialogue: Say, we could use some sasquatch muscle!! Besides, he'd be helpless here without me! He's somewhere in the mines. Once we find him, I'll order him to join us!

Original: EDGAR:It's time to break into Kefka's domain!
Dialogue: It's time to break into Kefka's domain!

Original: SETZER:What's wrong? Celes......
Dialogue: What's wrong? Celes......

Original: CELES:The Statues give the Espers the magical energy they need to live. If we destroy the Statues...
Dialogue: The Statues give the Espers the magical energy they need to live. If we destroy the Statues...

Original: EDGAR:What'll happen?
Dialogue: What'll happen?

Original: CELES:I'm really not sure, but...
Dialogue: I'm really not sure, but...

Original: STRAGO:The Espers...and magic, too, will most definitely disappear from this world.
Dialogue: The Espers...and magic, too, will most definitely disappear from this world.

Original: EDGAR:And then...
Dialogue: And then...

Original: CELES:What will happen to ... Terra...?
Dialogue: What will happen to ... Terra...?

Original: KEFKA:I've tapped into the ultimate power. Observe...!
Dialogue: I've tapped into the ultimate power. Observe...!

Original: KEFKA:Such magnificent power! You are like insects to me!
Dialogue: Such magnificent power! You are like insects to me!

Original: KEFKA:I will exterminate everyone, and everything!
Dialogue: I will exterminate everyone, and everything!

Original: KEFKA:Then I'll destroy those too. Why do people rebuild things they know are going to be destroyed? Why do people cling to life when they know they can't live forever? Think how meaningless each of your lives is!
Dialogue: Then I'll destroy those too. Why do people rebuild things they know are going to be destroyed? Why do people cling to life when they know they can't live forever? Think how meaningless each of your lives is!

Original: KEFKA:And have you found your #joy#, in this nearly dead world of ours?
Dialogue: And have you found your #joy#, in this nearly dead world of ours?

Original: TERRA:I know what love is...!
Dialogue: I know what love is...!

Original: LOCKE:And I have learned to celebrate life...and the living.
Dialogue: And I have learned to celebrate life...and the living.

Original: CYAN:My family lives on inside of me.
Dialogue: My family lives on inside of me.

Original: SHADOW:I know what friendship is... and family...
Dialogue: I know what friendship is... and family...

Original: EDGAR:It is my dream to build a kingdom in which I can guarantee freedom, and dignity.
Dialogue: It is my dream to build a kingdom in which I can guarantee freedom, and dignity.

Original: SABIN:I have come to experience anew the love of my brother!
Dialogue: I have come to experience anew the love of my brother!

Original: CELES:I've met someone who can accept me for what I am.
Dialogue: I've met someone who can accept me for what I am.

Original: SETZER:My friend's airship... and her love!
Dialogue: My friend's airship... and her love!

Original: STRAGO:I have a special little Granddaughter!
Dialogue: I have a special little Granddaughter!

Original: RELM:And I have a brave Grandpa who'll stand by me through it all.
Dialogue: And I have a brave Grandpa who'll stand by me through it all.

Original: MOG:I have my friends here!
Dialogue: I have my friends here!

Original: GAU:You my friends! Me uwaooo all of you!
Dialogue: You my friends! Me uwaooo all of you!

Original: KEFKA:This is sickening... You sound like chapters from a self-help booklet! Prepare yourselves!
Dialogue: This is sickening... You sound like chapters from a self-help booklet! Prepare yourselves!

Original: KEFKA:Now, for my next trick, I will make you all...disappear!
Dialogue: Now, for my next trick, I will make you all...disappear!

Original: KEFKA:I command the greatest power in the universe! You are all helpless before me!
Dialogue: I command the greatest power in the universe! You are all helpless before me!

Original: KEFKA:I will destroy everything... I will create a monument to non-existence!
Dialogue: I will destroy everything... I will create a monument to non-existence!

Original: KEFKA:No! I will hunt them down. I will destroy it all! Destroy! Destroy! Destroy!!
Dialogue: No! I will hunt them down. I will destroy it all! Destroy! Destroy! Destroy!!

Original: KEFKA:Hee, hee, hee!! But what fun is destruction if no #precious# lives are lost!
Dialogue: Hee, hee, hee!! But what fun is destruction if no #precious# lives are lost!

Original: KEFKA:Life... Dreams... Hope... Where'd they come from? And where are they headed...? These things... I am going to destroy!!
Dialogue: Life... Dreams... Hope... Where'd they come from? And where are they headed...? These things... I am going to destroy!!

Original: CELES:Come on, everybody! We have to work together!
Dialogue: Come on, everybody! We have to work together!

Original: CELES:Terra! What's wrong?
Dialogue: Terra! What's wrong?

Original: EDGAR:The Espers...They no longer exist...
Dialogue: The Espers...They no longer exist...

Original: CELES:You mean Terra too?
Dialogue: You mean Terra too?

Original: TERRA:Come with me. I can lead you out with my last ounce of strength.
Dialogue: Come with me. I can lead you out with my last ounce of strength.

Original: EDGAR:Cyan! Think you can handle that switch?!
Dialogue: Cyan! Think you can handle that switch?!

Original: CYAN:Machines... I HATE machines!
Dialogue: Machines... I HATE machines!

Original: CYAN:You just have to show technology who's boss!!
Dialogue: You just have to show technology who's boss!!

Original: SETZER:Wait! Let's go that way!! Sometimes in life you just have to FEEL your way through a situation!
Dialogue: Wait! Let's go that way!! Sometimes in life you just have to FEEL your way through a situation!

Original: SETZER:Daryl...I'm starting to sound just like you!
Dialogue: Daryl...I'm starting to sound just like you!

Original: MOG:Heeeeelp! Save me!
Dialogue: Heeeeelp! Save me!

Original: MOG:The hair!! Watch the hair!!!
Dialogue: The hair!! Watch the hair!!!

Original: CELES:It won't open!
Dialogue: It won't open!

Original: SABIN:I didn't turn my back on the kingdom, big brother... I knew you'd be a better king. I trained hard knowing I might have to help you one day... Now I know why I have these stupid muscles!
Dialogue: I didn't turn my back on the kingdom, big brother... I knew you'd be a better king. I trained hard knowing I might have to help you one day... Now I know why I have these stupid muscles!

Original: CELES:Both buttons have to be pressed simultaneously...
Dialogue: Both buttons have to be pressed simultaneously...

Original: SETZER:Gogo! Watch Celes and do exactly what she does!
Dialogue: Gogo! Watch Celes and do exactly what she does!

Original: GAU:Gau find short cut!
Dialogue: Gau find short cut!

Original: LOCKE:I will not let go... <D>...I promise!
Dialogue: I will not let go... <D>...I promise!

Original: MADUIN:Terra...we must part now. We Espers will disappear from this world...forever. But if the human part of you is very strongly attached to something or someone...You will probably be able to remain in this world as a human being...
Dialogue: Terra...we must part now. We Espers will disappear from this world...forever. But if the human part of you is very strongly attached to something or someone...You will probably be able to remain in this world as a human being...

Original: RELM:Grandpa! Stop goofing around!!
Dialogue: Grandpa! Stop goofing around!!

Original: STRAGO:Sorry, dear...RELM:If I hear even a peep out of you, I'm gonna draw your portrait!
Dialogue: Sorry, dear... RELM If I hear even a peep out of you, I'm gonna draw your portrait!

Original: STRAGO:No! Anything but that!
Dialogue: No! Anything but that!

Original: RELM:... ...but you know... Just once I'd really like to do a portrait of you...on canvas, of course!
Dialogue: ... ...but you know... Just once I'd really like to do a portrait of you...on canvas, of course!

Original: STRAGO:Relm! How can you be thinking about pictures at a time like this?!
Dialogue: Relm! How can you be thinking about pictures at a time like this?!

Original: SHADOW:Interceptor! Get going!
Dialogue: Interceptor! Get going!

Original: SHADOW:Stay well...
Dialogue: Stay well...

Original: SHADOW:Baram! I'm going to stop running. I'm going to begin all over again...
Dialogue: Baram! I'm going to stop running. I'm going to begin all over again...

Original: STRAGO:No...NO!!!! A "kid" like me doesn't know the meaning of defeat!
Dialogue: No...NO!!!! A "kid" like me doesn't know the meaning of defeat!

Original: EDGAR:The last piece of Magicite!
Dialogue: The last piece of Magicite!

Original: CELES:Terra! It's okay! Your power! It's fading...
Dialogue: Terra! It's okay! Your power! It's fading...

Original: CELES:Terra, your strength is going!
Dialogue: Terra, your strength is going!

Original: TERRA:Thank you, Setzer!
Dialogue: Thank you, Setzer!

Original: SETZER:Didn't I say it before?! This is the world's fastest ship!
Dialogue: Didn't I say it before?! This is the world's fastest ship!

Original: WEDGE:The Esper's gotta be in here. Move out!
Dialogue: The Esper's gotta be in here. Move out!

Original: LOCKE:Couldn't hold out...?! Uh oh...
Dialogue: Couldn't hold out...?! Uh oh...

Original: LOCKE:This is the pits. We'd better hightail it southward, to Figaro.
Dialogue: This is the pits. We'd better hightail it southward, to Figaro.

Original: MATRON:Edgar's at it again!? He hits on anything that moves!
Dialogue: Edgar's at it again!? He hits on anything that moves!

Original: EDGAR:You've been busy down south! Looking for more cities to destroy?
Dialogue: You've been busy down south! Looking for more cities to destroy?

Original: TROOPER:That's for us to know!
Dialogue: That's for us to know!

Original: EDGAR:I thought we were allies! What are you doing in my domain?
Dialogue: I thought we were allies! What are you doing in my domain?

Original: CHANCELLOR:The whole business of the succession was so repugnant to Sabin, the King's brother, that...... ......he fled the castle forever. The succession was settled with a coin toss...
Dialogue: The whole business of the succession was so repugnant to Sabin, the King's brother, that...... ......he fled the castle forever. The succession was settled with a coin toss...

Original: LOCKE:Edgar, What's the matter? You look positively spooked!
Dialogue: Edgar, What's the matter? You look positively spooked!

Original: EDGAR:Dddddddid you just see what I saw...?
Dialogue: Dddddddid you just see what I saw...?

Original: LOCKE:Yeah......this kid seems loaded for bear......
Dialogue: Yeah......this kid seems loaded for bear......

Original: EDGAR:She's amazing! That was magic! MAGIC!
Dialogue: She's amazing! That was magic! MAGIC!

Original: LOCKE:M M M M M M M MAGIC?! She used magic?
Dialogue: M M M M M M M MAGIC?! She used magic?

Original: EDGARLOCKE:Pswswswsw! pswswswsw!!
Dialogue: Pswswswsw! pswswswsw!!

Original: EDGAR:Terra......where on earth did you learn that?
Dialogue: Terra......where on earth did you learn that?

Original: LOCKE:Look, I didn't mean to make such a big deal of this......
Dialogue: Look, I didn't mean to make such a big deal of this......

Original: EDGAR:Me either......it's just that I've never actually SEEN magic before! Where did you...?
Dialogue: Me either......it's just that I've never actually SEEN magic before! Where did you...?

Original: LOCKE:Edgar, Terra can use magic, and we can't. That's the only difference between us. The fact is......we could use her help!
Dialogue: Edgar, Terra can use magic, and we can't. That's the only difference between us. The fact is......we could use her help!

Original: TERRA:Thank you, Locke! Thank you, Edgar!
Dialogue: Thank you, Locke! Thank you, Edgar!

Original: MERCHANT:I can't take money from the King!
Dialogue: I can't take money from the King!

Original: EDGAR:Look, don't you have a family? Just shut up and take it.
Dialogue: Look, don't you have a family? Just shut up and take it.

Original: MERCHANT:Sir Sabin, I can't take your money!
Dialogue: Sir Sabin, I can't take your money!

Original: SABIN:Take it! Haven't you heard? My brother says I'm a notorious spendthrift!
Dialogue: Take it! Haven't you heard? My brother says I'm a notorious spendthrift!

Original: SABIN:Master was... Vargas...
Dialogue: Master was... Vargas...

Original: DUNCANS WIFE:I'll never understand Vargas... Fortunately, my husband taught his most secret techniques to you.
Dialogue: I'll never understand Vargas... Fortunately, my husband taught his most secret techniques to you.

Original: SABIN:For 10 years you've treated me like a son. I am eternally grateful!
Dialogue: For 10 years you've treated me like a son. I am eternally grateful!

Original: LOCKE:At the very least you could give me a response...
Dialogue: At the very least you could give me a response...

Original: EDGAR:Stand back! He seems vaguely familiar... Wait a minute...!
Dialogue: Stand back! He seems vaguely familiar... Wait a minute...!

Original: EDGAR:That's Shadow...! He'd slit his mama's throat for a nickel!
Dialogue: That's Shadow...! He'd slit his mama's throat for a nickel!

Original: LOCKE:Better steer clear of him, I guess.
Dialogue: Better steer clear of him, I guess.

Original: SHADOW:Leave us. The dog eats strangers...
Dialogue: Leave us. The dog eats strangers...

Original: EDGAR:Hm... What's that smell...?
Dialogue: Hm... What's that smell...?

Original: EDGAR:Flowers... His favorite...
Dialogue: Flowers... His favorite...

Original: EDGAR:And this... His favorite tea...
Dialogue: And this... His favorite tea...

Original: EDGAR:These dishes! They were his favorite!
Dialogue: These dishes! They were his favorite!

Original: EDGAR:Sabin...he was...here?!
Dialogue: Sabin...he was...here?!

Original: EDGAR:What the...
Dialogue: What the...

Original: EDGAR:You know this guy?
Dialogue: You know this guy?

Original: MAN:Of course. He left a couple of days ago after he heard Master Duncan was slain. He headed into the mountains. I heard Duncan's son, Vargas, is missing as well. I have a bad feeling about this...
Dialogue: Of course. He left a couple of days ago after he heard Master Duncan was slain. He headed into the mountains. I heard Duncan's son, Vargas, is missing as well. I have a bad feeling about this...

Original: VARGAS:Time to put an end to this!
Dialogue: Time to put an end to this!

Original: SABIN:The Master's teachings...... Must use a Blitz technique......
Dialogue: The Master's teachings...... Must use a Blitz technique......

Original: BANON:Who did this? Who left this piece of paper here?
Dialogue: Who did this? Who left this piece of paper here?

Original: BANON:Have you made a decision? Will you become our last ray of hope?
Dialogue: Have you made a decision? Will you become our last ray of hope?

Original: (if answering "no" to Banon repeatedly)BANON:I see...
Dialogue: I see...

Original: BANON:I thought as much...
Dialogue: I thought as much...

Original: BANON:You're sure about this?
Dialogue: You're sure about this?

Original: TERRA:Hope... How can anyone put their hope in me?
Dialogue: Hope... How can anyone put their hope in me?

Original: BANON:You will? Really!!
Dialogue: You will? Really!!

Original: TERRA:But... I'm scared...
Dialogue: But... I'm scared...

Original: BANON:The person who possesses this relic need not fear harm.
Dialogue: The person who possesses this relic need not fear harm.

Original: BANON:Please, Terra... I'd like you to take it with you.
Dialogue: Please, Terra... I'd like you to take it with you.

Original: TERRA:What is this??? <D>
Dialogue: What is this??? <D>

Original: BANON:A lucky charm. Take it!
Dialogue: A lucky charm. Take it!

Original: BANON:I have a plan! Please get everyone together!

Dialogue: ...I lost my friends... and my family.

Dialogue: That coin...!? BIG BROTHER!!! Don't tell me...!

Dialogue: See! I knew she couldn't be trusted!

Dialogue: Whoa! What IS that?!

Dialogue: Something horrible's coming!!

Dialogue: Uwaaoo! What in the...?

Dialogue: Gau! Gau go!!

Dialogue: Where are you going?! D' goh! MADUIN Madonna's getting drawn into the next world...!

Dialogue: Impossible! It's too late! I've already begun casting the barrier. There's no turning back!

Dialogue: Hmmm...if this is how it's gonna be then...take this!

Dialogue: Our battle lies before us. We must make ourselves ready.

Dialogue: Get the Espers to understand, and we can bring this war to a screeching halt. Terra... I know you can do this...

Dialogue: The sealed gate stands at the eastern edge of the Empire. There's a base there, but somehow we'll have to slip through...

Dialogue: I can do it... But why do I feel so wretched?

Dialogue: Beyond is the Esper World...

Original: CYAN:What an eerie place...
Dialogue: What an eerie place...

Dialogue: From here on, it's all up to Terra...

Dialogue: We're counting on you, Terra...

Dialogue: Why'd you bring me to such an awful place!?

Dialogue: ...the Espers... Something happened...

Dialogue: I'm sure the Espers were headed for Vector...

Dialogue: I could feel the warrior spirits of those Espers!

Dialogue: Somehow we need to tap in to the power of those Espers...

Dialogue: Let's see what's become of the Empire! Hurry!

Dialogue: Urghh! For the time being, I don't own the skies...

Dialogue: ...ooh... Gau...high place... Not good...don't like...

Dialogue: I'll have to repair the air ship. Go scout around and let me know what's happening.

Dialogue: Repairs aren't finished yet. You'd better take the boat from Albrook.

Dialogue: What ARE you talking about...?! ......!! Talking with...Espers...?

Dialogue: It was like this when we got here.

Original: RETURNER:What on earth...
Dialogue: What on earth...

Dialogue: Could Gestahl have meant such a thing? Team up with the Empire to track down an Esper... Hmm...

Dialogue: Makes sense. Can't just forget about Espers...

Dialogue: The war... It's over...right?

Dialogue: We didn't have to do a thing! The Empire's troops just ran away in terror!

Original: NARSHE GUARD:What's going on?
Dialogue: What's going on?

Original: KEFKA:Grrr! How DARE they put me in a place like this!
Dialogue: Grrr! How DARE they put me in a place like this!

Original: KEFKA:I don't believe this!
Dialogue: I don't believe this!

Original: KEFKA:What a bore.
Dialogue: What a bore.

Dialogue: Well then... To our hometowns!

Original: GESTAHL:Well then... To the Empire!
Dialogue: Well then... To the Empire!

Original: GESTAHL:Well then... To the Returners!
Dialogue: Well then... To the Returners!

Original: GESTAHL:My desire for power got the best of me. Now I've come to my senses.
Dialogue: My desire for power got the best of me. Now I've come to my senses.

Original: GESTAHL:I feel we need each other's help at this time...
Dialogue: I feel we need each other's help at this time...

Original: GESTAHL:Some of my men refuse to embrace peace. I felt they'd understand if they actually met you face to face.
Dialogue: Some of my men refuse to embrace peace. I felt they'd understand if they actually met you face to face.

Original: CID:All will be put right if we can achieve peace...!
Dialogue: All will be put right if we can achieve peace...!

Original: TROOPERS:We want to test your strength! Won't you fight with us for a couple of minutes?
Dialogue: We want to test your strength! Won't you fight with us for a couple of minutes?

Original: TROOPER:Just as we thought...
Dialogue: Just as we thought...

Original: GESTAHL:I understand. My only dream in life is...peace! Now I must ask for a favor...
Dialogue: I understand. My only dream in life is...peace! Now I must ask for a favor...

Original: GESTAHL:I understand. I've ordered this war to be over! Now I must ask for a favor...
Dialogue: I understand. I've ordered this war to be over! Now I must ask for a favor...

Original: GESTAHL:I understand. I'm truly sorry for what I've done! Now I must ask for a favor...
Dialogue: I understand. I'm truly sorry for what I've done! Now I must ask for a favor...

Dialogue: We cannot simply ignore the Espers!! Please...come with me!

Dialogue: Didn't I see you at Doma? ...I'm SURE I did... So that was General Leo...

Original: LEO:You! You're Cyan, liege to the king of Doma! Please forgive me for not being there to stop Kefka...
Dialogue: You! You're Cyan, liege to the king of Doma! Please forgive me for not being there to stop Kefka...

Original: CYAN:...... That wasn't your fault.
Dialogue: ...... That wasn't your fault.

Original: CID:Wow, what a ship!
Dialogue: Wow, what a ship!

Original: SETZER:That landing really messed up the engine. It'll take a while to fix...
Dialogue: That landing really messed up the engine. It'll take a while to fix...

Original: CID:I'll help. No machine can stump me!
Dialogue: I'll help. No machine can stump me!

Original: SETZER:Don't touch anything!
Dialogue: Don't touch anything!

Original: CID:Go kill time in the casino! I can speed this crate up!
Dialogue: Go kill time in the casino! I can speed this crate up!

Original: SETZER:...... You little...!! Get outta my sight!
Dialogue: ...... You little...!! Get outta my sight!

Original: CID:But I could really make this thing hum...!
Dialogue: But I could really make this thing hum...!

Original: TERRA:You love this ship, more than anything, huh?
Dialogue: You love this ship, more than anything, huh?

Original: SETZER:Actually, when I was young there was something I was mad about...
Dialogue: Actually, when I was young there was something I was mad about...

Original: SETZER:In my youth I dreamed of having the world's fastest airship.
Dialogue: In my youth I dreamed of having the world's fastest airship.

Original: TERRA:You mean......
Dialogue: You mean......

Original: SETZER:At that time there was a young girl who piloted the Falcon, the fastest vessel ever made. Sometimes we were the worst of rivals...but other times we were the best of friends. We always egged each other on to go faster and higher. When she disappeared along with her ship... I felt like I lost my spirit.
Dialogue: At that time there was a young girl who piloted the Falcon, the fastest vessel ever made. Sometimes we were the worst of rivals...but other times we were the best of friends. We always egged each other on to go faster and higher. When she disappeared along with her ship... I felt like I lost my spirit.

Original: SETZER:... Poor Daryl...
Dialogue: ... Poor Daryl...

Original: SHADOW:I'm working for the Empire. But don't worry...I'm not going to garrote you!
Dialogue: I'm working for the Empire. But don't worry...I'm not going to garrote you!

Original: NPC:'NPC:Stay clear of the engine room. It's dangerous.
Dialogue: 'NPC Stay clear of the engine room. It's dangerous.

Dialogue: Terra, we'll continue yesterday's conversation later...

Original: MAYOR:Welcome, welcome! Magic...? What is this "magic"?
Dialogue: Welcome, welcome! Magic...? What is this "magic"?

Original: MAYOR:No one is to divulge that we are able to use magic!
Dialogue: No one is to divulge that we are able to use magic!

Dialogue: What a beautiful day.

Original: RELM:Interceptor, please come back again and play!
Dialogue: Interceptor, please come back again and play!

Dialogue: General Leo, prepare yourself!

Original: LEO:No. I won't let this happen!
Dialogue: No. I won't let this happen!

Dialogue: I can only take some comfort in the fact that there were so few casualties.

Dialogue: Is that you, Strago? Have you come back to hunt Hidon?

Original: GUNGHO:He'll never change. That's who he is! When you were younger you hunted Hidon, the legendary monster. But you quit before you found it...
Dialogue: He'll never change. That's who he is! When you were younger you hunted Hidon, the legendary monster. But you quit before you found it...

Original: STRAGO:I didn't really quit! It's just that, well, the monster lives only on Ebot's Rock, which has been submerged for some time.
Dialogue: I didn't really quit! It's just that, well, the monster lives only on Ebot's Rock, which has been submerged for some time.

Dialogue: You never could give me an honest answer.

Original: GUNGHO:What a buffoon!!
Dialogue: What a buffoon!!

Original: TERRA:I'm all right. I'm sure peace is within our grasp!
Dialogue: I'm all right. I'm sure peace is within our grasp!

Dialogue: I can't believe we played a major role in it all!

Original: CYAN:The Empire deserves the worst!
Dialogue: The Empire deserves the worst!

Dialogue: We can't be smug. We must be thinking of our strategy.

Dialogue: Let me at the Empire!

Dialogue: In all my travels, and in all my years...

Dialogue: I know. Let me draw their portraits!

Dialogue: What's the most important thing in life? Being free of obligations! Otherwise, you lose the ability to gamble...

Dialogue: Gau become stronger on the Veldt.

Dialogue: I lose AGAIN! Well, today I've brought a pal! Mr. Chupon! Come on down!

Original: ULTROS:Better not irritate him! He gets hungry when he's irritated...
Dialogue: Better not irritate him! He gets hungry when he's irritated...

Original: ULTROS:Mr. Chupon's taciturn but terribly powerful!
Dialogue: Mr. Chupon's taciturn but terribly powerful!

Original: ULTROS:I was drowsing the other day when Mr. Chupon gnawed on my head! He needed something to polish his teeth on!
Dialogue: I was drowsing the other day when Mr. Chupon gnawed on my head! He needed something to polish his teeth on!

Original: SHADOW:We meet again.
Dialogue: We meet again.

Original: "Shadow!!"SHADOW:I'll be blown to bits before I can even collect my pay...
Dialogue: I'll be blown to bits before I can even collect my pay...

Original: CID:I feel much better! Thanks, Celes!
Dialogue: I feel much better! Thanks, Celes!

Original: CID:My dear, I...feel I'm not going to be around much longer...
Dialogue: My dear, I...feel I'm not going to be around much longer...

Original: CID:Celes, thanks for all you've done for me!
Dialogue: Celes, thanks for all you've done for me!

Original: CID:Hackack!! I feel a little better!
Dialogue: Hackack!! I feel a little better!

Original: CID:Cough...wheeze...I can't bear this any longer...
Dialogue: Cough...wheeze...I can't bear this any longer...

Original: CID:I...I'm not long for this cruel new world...
Dialogue: I...I'm not long for this cruel new world...

Dialogue: My worst nightmare is to think of you alone here on this wretched island...hack...wheeze!!

Dialogue: Cough...hack...ACK!! While I can still talk, I...wheeze...pant...want to thank you...cough!

Dialogue: Granddad, here's a fish! Eat up!

Original: CID:Oh! Yum... Chomp, munch, chew...
Dialogue: Oh! Yum... Chomp, munch, chew...

Original: CELES:What's up?
Dialogue: What's up?

Dialogue: Celes...the project that kept me going over the past year is down below. Go have a look at it!

Original: CELES:Granddad. You have to eat, or else... W...what's the matter?
Dialogue: Granddad. You have to eat, or else... W...what's the matter?

Original: CELES:No...NO!! You promised you'd stay here with me!!
Dialogue: No...NO!! You promised you'd stay here with me!!

Original: CELES:Granddad, ANSWER ME! Tell me you're just joking!
Dialogue: Granddad, ANSWER ME! Tell me you're just joking!

Original: CID:Celes... You must leave this place. You have to find your friends!
Dialogue: Celes... You must leave this place. You have to find your friends!

Original: CELES:I know... But I'll bring 'em all back to meet you!
Dialogue: I know... But I'll bring 'em all back to meet you!

Original: CID:That Locke fellow, too, no doubt...
Dialogue: That Locke fellow, too, no doubt...

Original: CELES:I'll make you proud of me...Granddad...
Dialogue: I'll make you proud of me...Granddad...

Dialogue: Those others who were here... when they were feeling down they'd take a leap of faith from the cliffs up north...perked 'em right up!

Dialogue: Everyone's gone...Even Locke, who promised to watch over me...The world's slowly ebbing away...

Original: CELES:Phew...Why did you nurse me back to health? Did I ever ask you to help me?!
Dialogue: Phew...Why did you nurse me back to health? Did I ever ask you to help me?!

Original: CELES:A bandana??? No...it can't be... Hey, you! Where'd you get this?! Is the person who healed you still alive? Answer me!
Dialogue: A bandana??? No...it can't be... Hey, you! Where'd you get this?! Is the person who healed you still alive? Answer me!

Original: CELES:He's alive... Locke's still alive!!!
Dialogue: He's alive... Locke's still alive!!!

Original: SABIN:Hey! Celes!
Dialogue: Hey! Celes!

Original: CELES:Let's head in!
Dialogue: Let's head in!

Original: SABIN:Hey! You're alive!!! Get in there, quick!
Dialogue: Hey! You're alive!!! Get in there, quick!

Original: SABIN:I...I...I'm losing my grip...Keep up the fight, brother!
Dialogue: I...I...I'm losing my grip...Keep up the fight, brother!

Original: CELES:Sabin! You're alive!
Dialogue: Sabin! You're alive!

Original: CELES:I thought everyone was gone...I had given up all hope...But... fortunately, I was wrong! Now I know they're all alive! We need to find everyone! Then...
Dialogue: I thought everyone was gone...I had given up all hope...But... fortunately, I was wrong! Now I know they're all alive! We need to find everyone! Then...

Original: DUNCANS WIFE:No, dear! Duncan's still alive and well! He's meditating just north of Narshe.
Dialogue: No, dear! Duncan's still alive and well! He's meditating just north of Narshe.

Original: SABIN:Don't treat us like strangers anymore!
Dialogue: Don't treat us like strangers anymore!

Original: SABIN:There's only one little problem, eh, brother!
Dialogue: There's only one little problem, eh, brother!

Original: CELES:Locke...He's alive!!
Dialogue: Locke...He's alive!!

Original: LOLA:I hope his reply comes soon!
Dialogue: I hope his reply comes soon!

Original: LOLA:I knew that these flowers and letters weren't sent by my boyfriend. I just didn't want to admit it. I was lying to myself... But I'm all right now. As I read those letters......the pain I felt in my heart became bearable...I'm sure whoever wrote them has suffered greatly...I wish I could meet him...
Dialogue: I knew that these flowers and letters weren't sent by my boyfriend. I just didn't want to admit it. I was lying to myself... But I'm all right now. As I read those letters......the pain I felt in my heart became bearable...I'm sure whoever wrote them has suffered greatly...I wish I could meet him...

Original: CYAN:Look to the future...We have a lot of life left to live...
Dialogue: Look to the future...We have a lot of life left to live...

Original: CYAN:No! That's mine!!!
Dialogue: No! That's mine!!!

Original: RELM:I'm still a bit groggy...But I'm okay. Interceptor always makes me happy!
Dialogue: I'm still a bit groggy...But I'm okay. Interceptor always makes me happy!

Original: SHADOW:No need to worry. It's just a scratch. Also, he's gonna stand guard, so you just relax.
Dialogue: No need to worry. It's just a scratch. Also, he's gonna stand guard, so you just relax.

Original: ULTROS:Look at me! I'm a receptionist! G'fa, ha, ha! Now, you'd better watch what ya bet, or master Chupon'll just come and take it from ya!
Dialogue: Look at me! I'm a receptionist! G'fa, ha, ha! Now, you'd better watch what ya bet, or master Chupon'll just come and take it from ya!

Original: SIGFRIED:Someone's been pretending to be me! Don't be fooled!
Dialogue: Someone's been pretending to be me! Don't be fooled!

Original: TERRA:I'm sorry...I'm staying! The children need me.
Dialogue: I'm sorry...I'm staying! The children need me.

Original: DUANE:I...don't know what to do. Katarin's pregnant...
Dialogue: I...don't know what to do. Katarin's pregnant...

Original: TERRA:Please! Save this village! I simply can't fight...
Dialogue: Please! Save this village! I simply can't fight...

Original: DUANE:I'll keep Katarin safe.
Dialogue: I'll keep Katarin safe.

Original: KATARIN:I feel safe when Duane's around.
Dialogue: I feel safe when Duane's around.

Original: DUANE:This is our village. You can't just waltz in here and start barking out orders!
Dialogue: This is our village. You can't just waltz in here and start barking out orders!

Original: KATARIN:Terra's helped us all to survive. Ever since she's been here, we've felt hopeful for the future.
Dialogue: Terra's helped us all to survive. Ever since she's been here, we've felt hopeful for the future.

Original: DUANE:A new life... I've got to do my best to help make the world a safer place...
Dialogue: A new life... I've got to do my best to help make the world a safer place...

Original: KATARIN:We'll be okay. Just make sure these kids'll have a world to grow up in!
Dialogue: We'll be okay. Just make sure these kids'll have a world to grow up in!

Original: ESPER:You HUMANS freed me from that prison of ice? You possess Magicite?! Who are you?! I sense war and destruction...Could that stupid war possibly have lasted a thousand years? I can tell that you want to put a stop to the madness...Let's see if you are worthy!
Dialogue: You HUMANS freed me from that prison of ice? You possess Magicite?! Who are you?! I sense war and destruction...Could that stupid war possibly have lasted a thousand years? I can tell that you want to put a stop to the madness...Let's see if you are worthy!

Original: MOG:I'm your boss, kupo! You're gonna join us, kupo!!!
Dialogue: I'm your boss, kupo! You're gonna join us, kupo!!!

Original: MOG:Umaro! No slouching, now!
Dialogue: Umaro! No slouching, now!

Original: CREATURE:I am Gogo, master of the simulacrum... My miming skills will astonish you.
Dialogue: I am Gogo, master of the simulacrum... My miming skills will astonish you.

Original: GOGO:Yes...I have been idle for too long. If I deem you worthy, I'll mime your actions in battle. But first you must tell me what you're doing here.
Dialogue: Yes...I have been idle for too long. If I deem you worthy, I'll mime your actions in battle. But first you must tell me what you're doing here.

Original: GOGO:What an unusual tale...But I sense that you're trying to help make things right again. This should be fun. When do we leave?
Dialogue: What an unusual tale...But I sense that you're trying to help make things right again. This should be fun. When do we leave?

Original: WREXSOUL:I'm gonna possess your body! I'll only appear in this form again when you're about to expire!
Dialogue: I'm gonna possess your body! I'll only appear in this form again when you're about to expire!

Original: CYAN:Thanks be to you.
Dialogue: Thanks be to you.

Original: CYAN:I heard my wife and children calling out to me! Their voices finally gave me the strength and courage to come to grips with my own suffering.
Dialogue: I heard my wife and children calling out to me! Their voices finally gave me the strength and courage to come to grips with my own suffering.

Original: CYAN:No...I didn't do anything...then...and I can't now...I'm a man with no honor...
Dialogue: No...I didn't do anything...then...and I can't now...I'm a man with no honor...

Original: CYAN:Elayne and Owain live on in my heart. I must leave the past behind. I have much to live for...
Dialogue: Elayne and Owain live on in my heart. I must leave the past behind. I have much to live for...

Original: STAGE MASTER:Don't press the wrong switch, or...
Dialogue: Don't press the wrong switch, or...

Original: TERRA:Love between a human and an Esper...
Dialogue: Love between a human and an Esper...

Original: MAYOR:It's only been a year since the world changed...But it feels like forever.
Dialogue: It's only been a year since the world changed...But it feels like forever.

Original: RELM:Yea!! We're back! It's like old times!
Dialogue: Yea!! We're back! It's like old times!

Original: STRAGO:Time to relax! Home sweet home!
Dialogue: Time to relax! Home sweet home!

Original: RELM:This is terrible! Gungho's hurt!
Dialogue: This is terrible! Gungho's hurt!

Original: STRAGO:Gungho, wake up!
Dialogue: Gungho, wake up!

Original: STRAGO:Who did this to you?
Dialogue: Who did this to you?

Original: GUNGHO:It was...Hidon, the beast you and I used to hunt. I almost had it...
Dialogue: It was...Hidon, the beast you and I used to hunt. I almost had it...

Original: STRAGO:You took on Hidon...?
Dialogue: You took on Hidon...?

Original: GUNGHO:Oooh...cough, cough...
Dialogue: Oooh...cough, cough...

Original: GUNGHO:Strago... Please...you must avenge me...
Dialogue: Strago... Please...you must avenge me...

Original: RELM:Gramps! Why are you hesitating!
Dialogue: Gramps! Why are you hesitating!

Original: STRAGO:Well... I spent my youth chasing that creature. To do it again at this age is more than I bargained for.
Dialogue: Well... I spent my youth chasing that creature. To do it again at this age is more than I bargained for.

Original: STRAGO:Gungho... rest easy, I'll do it for you!
Dialogue: Gungho... rest easy, I'll do it for you!

Original: RELM:Just a minute! You don't think you're going alone, do you?
Dialogue: Just a minute! You don't think you're going alone, do you?

Original: STRAGO:I spent too many years of my life hunting that thing. It is my obsession, not yours.
Dialogue: I spent too many years of my life hunting that thing. It is my obsession, not yours.

Original: RELM:But Grandpa! This "obsession" of yours could easily slay you! You're my Grandfather. I can't just sit idly by and watch you go.
Dialogue: But Grandpa! This "obsession" of yours could easily slay you! You're my Grandfather. I can't just sit idly by and watch you go.

Original: STRAGO:Sorry, Relm. I'm so grateful that you care! But as its name implies, the Hidon is extremely difficult to find. Unless I go alone, it will not show itself.
Dialogue: Sorry, Relm. I'm so grateful that you care! But as its name implies, the Hidon is extremely difficult to find. Unless I go alone, it will not show itself.

Dialogue: Next stop, Ebot's Rock.

Dialogue: I'm hungry! Hungry hungry hungry hungry hungry hungry hungry hungry hungry hungry hungry hungry!! Feed me! Otherwise, I won't let you by!

Dialogue: Bluuurp! Whew!

Dialogue: Oh, yeah, you wanna pass through here, right?

Dialogue: Eh!! What the...!

Dialogue: That's Hidon!

Dialogue: I did it! I...I...I actually beat Hidon!

Dialogue: What's all the hullabaloo?!

Original: STRAGO:Listen to me! I DEFEATED Hidon!
Dialogue: Listen to me! I DEFEATED Hidon!

Original: GUNGHO:You WHAT?! You b...beat Hidon?! You're lying! LYING!
Dialogue: You WHAT?! You b...beat Hidon?! You're lying! LYING!

Dialogue: No, he's not! He really defeated Hidon.

Dialogue: Ho, ho, ho! If I didn't know better, I'd say that Hidon wasn't my only enemy!

Dialogue: I don't believe this. This has to be a joke!

Dialogue: Ho, ho, ho!! ...by the way, how are your wounds healing, Gungho?

Original: GUNGHO:Eh? Oh, they're fine...
Dialogue: Eh? Oh, they're fine...

Dialogue: There I was, in a cave that seemed endless. Then, before I knew it, Hidon appeared!

Original: STRAGO:I stared Hidon straight in the eye, lifted my staff, and let him have it! G'Pow!! Thwack!! Crash!!
Dialogue: I stared Hidon straight in the eye, lifted my staff, and let him have it! G'Pow!! Thwack!! Crash!!

Original: STRAGO:I wanted to show my enemy the true meaning of the word, "hero"!
Dialogue: I wanted to show my enemy the true meaning of the word, "hero"!

Original: STRAGO:And then......
Dialogue: And then......

Original: RELM:What happened to Grandpa?
Dialogue: What happened to Grandpa?

Original: GUNGHO:Huh? Finally! He nodded off.
Dialogue: Huh? Finally! He nodded off.

Original: GUNGHO:However... Let's let him be! He's nice and...quiet... Now, about my "wounds"...
Dialogue: However... Let's let him be! He's nice and...quiet... Now, about my "wounds"...

Original: RELM:Wait! First let me thank you. You gave Grandpa a reason to go and defeat something that had tormented him for decades! Even if YOU were faking, that creature meant business!
Dialogue: Wait! First let me thank you. You gave Grandpa a reason to go and defeat something that had tormented him for decades! Even if YOU were faking, that creature meant business!

Original: GUNGHO:What a granddaughter he's raised! Amazing!
Dialogue: What a granddaughter he's raised! Amazing!

Original: RELM:And what a terrible actor you are!
Dialogue: And what a terrible actor you are!

Original: RELM:Only Strago could have been taken in by that performance!
Dialogue: Only Strago could have been taken in by that performance!

Original: GUNGHO:What the...!
Dialogue: What the...!

Original: GUNGHO:Everything okay?
Dialogue: Everything okay?

Dialogue: Hidon's appeared at Ebot's Rock again!

Dialogue: The Espers, and magic, too, will cease to exist.

Dialogue: Everyone's calling me.

Dialogue: Oh! But it hasn't yet begun! And I'm giving you a front-row seat!

Dialogue: Terra! You're back!

Dialogue: Come with me!

Dialogue: Where's Sabin when you need him...?

Dialogue: Ladies first!

Dialogue: Don't fall! Remember, you promised me you'd do your #Maria# act again!

Dialogue: What a woman! Your life is hanging by a bandana!

Dialogue: This is my good luck charm... <D>When I found this, my life took a turn for the better...

Dialogue: Locke... Promise me someday you'll look after me again?!

Dialogue: I won't be done in by an older woman!

Dialogue: Wait a minute, lover boy!

Dialogue: You can't just throw me aside!

Dialogue: How about a nice portrait for you, hmm?!

Dialogue: My job here's over. I've earned my fee! Ta-ta......!

Dialogue: General Leo... I believe I understand what you're trying to say.

Dialogue: As long as there're people who need to be protected, I'll fight!

Dialogue: What an amazing device!

Dialogue: If something happens to me, all the world's women will grieve!

Dialogue: I'm glad I made it this far...I feel I have a lot to live for...

Dialogue: Hey everyone! Let me see the light in your eyes! The old man, here, hasn't given up yet!

Dialogue: Let's do it! Let's go get that madman!

Dialogue: Gau become stronger on the Veldt.

Dialogue: Quick! Fix that chair! Then you can use it to reach the roof.

Dialogue: ......??? ...Gau's...father?! Oooogauooooo!

Dialogue: Just a minute... We can't just go there with you looking like this. I know! Let's go to Jidoor and give you a make-over!

Dialogue: No, Gau! Don't eat with your fingers!

Dialogue: Don't say "Yaoooo" when you mean "Yes!"

Dialogue: Did you say something?

Dialogue: I got it! A tuxedo, silk hat...and... ...a rose in his teeth!

Dialogue: I think that's overdoing it just a bit... He should have a bandana on his head!

Dialogue: What's so great about a bandana? Most of the time I see 'em tied around dogs at the beach!

Dialogue: HEY! What do you mean by that?

Dialogue: Okay, Gau? Now, any father'd be glad to have a son like you!

Dialogue: Right. The truth is, he's alive! Come here, Gau!

Dialogue: What is this?! What's with this "son" business? I never had a son!

Original: AGED MAN:But now that you mention it, I once had a terrible dream. In it, a demon-child was born! I grabbed the creature, and rushed off to the Veldt with itIt was crying like crazy when I arrived on the Veldt.
Dialogue: But now that you mention it, I once had a terrible dream. In it, a demon-child was born! I grabbed the creature, and rushed off to the Veldt with it…It was crying like crazy when I arrived on the Veldt.

Dialogue: But, Sir...

Dialogue: I left the child there... And without looking back, I turned and started to run.

Dialogue: I'm trying to tell you...

Dialogue: Suddenly the crying stopped. I turned around and saw a frightful monster... Hideous! Still gives me the shakes. SABIN I give up...

Dialogue: But you, young man, your parents must be proud of you! I still have dreams of that demon child...Frightening...

Dialogue: Why! You old... He's completely lost his mind! Gau, I'm gonna clobber him!!

Dialogue: I...I'm sorry...

Dialogue: Fffatherrr...alive...H... a... p... p... y...

Dialogue: Eh? Say, is everything fixed yet?

Dialogue: Map...?! Everyone's askin' 'bout that map!

Dialogue: Little while ago, some guy wearin' a bandana asked for the map. So I told him!

Dialogue: It's where the mountains form a star-shape! You should have just come out and asked me. No need to be shy!

Dialogue: Got it?! Where the mountains form the shape of a star!

Original: NPC: Arrrgh! I HATE it when that happens!
Dialogue: rrrgh! I HATE it when that happens!

Dialogue: o, ho, ho... There's nothing I can't buy!

Dialogue: kay! Here's our next item!

Dialogue: ell, how 'bout it?

Dialogue: XXX GP!

Dialogue: Papa!! I want that! Please!

Dialogue: No, you don't! Now, pipe down!

Dialogue: I want it...I want it! Buy it! Pretty please!!

Dialogue: re there any more bids?

Dialogue: Ho, ho, ho...All right! But just this once! And... ... Keep it a secret from Mama!

Dialogue: Yahoo!!! Thanks, Papa! Yahoo!

PAPA:1000000 GP!

Dialogue: Well, we have our treat for the day. Let's go home!

Dialogue: Yahoo! Yippy!!!!

Dialogue: Look out! Move! Cough...wheeze... Darn this old body... Hey...you deaf?

Dialogue: Wa, ha, ha... Why the surprised face? Did you think I'd...gone?

Dialogue: Duncan... I'm so glad you're safe!!!

Dialogue: Whoa?! Sabin, this can't be... Tears??

Dialogue: Wa, ha, ha... Nothing happened to me! The earth yawned right open to take me but I scrambled to safety!

Dialogue: Sabin!! It is now time to complete your training. Use these new skills to smash Kefka!

Dialogue: Go! Give Kefka the boot!

Dialogue: Cough...wheeze... Don't worry about me! Go! Destroy Kefka!

Dialogue: This's like old times! I have to wander around for a while!

Dialogue: Hmm... Castle hasn't changed much...

Dialogue: And yet it's all different... Mom and Dad are gone... Everyone's gone... Since that day...

Dialogue: B...brother... Waa, ahhh, ahhh...

Dialogue: So... They went and told you...

Dialogue: Your father... He just uttered his last wish that Figaro be divided between you...

Dialogue: This is NONSENSE!! Everyone's saying that the Empire poisoned Dad... And the only thing on your minds is "Who's going to be the next king?!" You're all pathetic!

Dialogue: No one cared when Mom passed away, either...

Dialogue: That's not...

Dialogue: You were as bad as any of 'em!

Dialogue: Empire of murderers... They won't get away with this!

Dialogue: Matron... Please leave us...

Dialogue: I'm outta here! I'm forsaking this war-sick realm for my dignity and freedom.

Dialogue: You said you were sick of it too, right?!

Dialogue: What'll happen to this realm if we both leave? And what would Dad say...?

Dialogue: Sabin, let's settle this with a toss of a coin.

Dialogue: If it's heads, you win. We'll choose whichever path we want, without any regrets. Okay?

Dialogue: This is for Dad!

Dialogue: And then, you opted for your freedom.

Dialogue: It's been...10 years. The little shrimp's grown into a whopping lobster!

Dialogue: And you're a king crab!

Dialogue: Sabin... I often wonder if he'd be proud of me...

Original: SABIN:Don't you ever doubt that!
Dialogue: Don't you ever doubt that!

Dialogue: 10 years...

Dialogue: Where has the time gone...?

Dialogue: Here's to a couple of confused grownups!

Original: EDGAR:Here's to Dad...
Dialogue: Here's to Dad...

Dialogue: ...to Mom... ...and to Figaro.

Dialogue: Clyde...I'm... done for... F...find me here... Please, Clyde...

Dialogue: Yahoooo! We did it, Clyde!

Dialogue: A million GP! What a blast! I love this!

Dialogue: Guess it's time to change our name.

Dialogue: Our name?

Dialogue: We need something more...appropriate. Such as...? ... Shadow! Not bad, huh?

Dialogue: Great train robbers of the century... Shadow...?

Dialogue: Open your eyes!

Dialogue: I'm scared...hack, cough... Is...is this MY blood...?

Original: CLYDE:You're gonna be okay!
Dialogue: You're gonna be okay!

Original: BARAM:I've let you down... I'm sorry...
Dialogue: I've let you down... I'm sorry...

Dialogue: Save your strength. We're almost to a town.

Dialogue: You don't have to pretend. I know. I've lost...too much blood.

Dialogue: Get going! I'm gonna slow you down.

Dialogue: You wanna get caught?

Dialogue: Before you go... You have to use your knife... CLYDE WHAT!!!!

Dialogue: Think what they'll do to me if I get caught. I don't want to go through that. Do me this favor.

Dialogue: Are you...shaking? I can't believe it! You're acting like a coward! Come on, you weakling! Grab a knife and...

Dialogue: I CAN'T!

Original: CLYDE:I'm sorry...
Dialogue: I'm sorry...

Dialogue: Clyde! How dare you!?

Dialogue: Hey...HEY! Stay with me now! CLYDE Where...am...?
